              def address_params
          
      96. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    96.

      97.

      98. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    98.

    99.

    100.

      101. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    101.

    102.

            class Api::V1::CompanyContactsController < ApplicationController
          
      2. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    2. 
            

            

              def index
          
      3. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    3. 
            

            

                company_id = params[:company_id]
          
      4. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    4. 
            

            

                
          
      5. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    5. 
            

            

                begin
          
      6. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    6. 
            

            

                  contacts = CompanyContactsService.active_contacts(company_id: company_id, token: current_token)
          
      7. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    7. 
            

            

                  render json: {
          
      8. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    8. 
            

            

                    contacts: contacts.map do |contact|
          
      9. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    9. 
            

            

                      {
          
      10. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    10. 
            

            

                        id: contact[:id],
          
      11. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    11. 
            

            

                        name: contact[:full_name] || contact[:name],
          
      12. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    12. 
            

            

                        email: contact[:email],
          
      13. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    13. 
            

            

                        telephone: contact[:telephone]
          
      14. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    14. 
            

            

                      }
          
      15. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    15. 
            

            

                    end
          
      16. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    16. 
            

            

                  }
          
      17. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    17. 
            

            

                rescue ApiService::ApiError => e
          
      18. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    18. 
            

            

                  render json: { error: e.message }, status: :unprocessable_content
          
      19. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    19. 
            

            

                rescue => e
          
      20. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    20. 
            

            

                  render json: { error: "Unexpected error: #{e.message}" }, status: :internal_server_error
          
      21. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    21. 
            

            

                end
          
      22.

              end

            class Api::V1::InvoiceNumberingController < ApplicationController

              skip_before_action :authenticate_user!

              before_action :authenticate_api_user!
          
      4. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    4. 
            

            

            
          
      5. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    5. 
            

            

              def next_available
          
      6. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    6. 
            

            

                begin
          
      7. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    7. 
            

            

                  year = params[:year] || Date.current.year
          
      8. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    8. 
            

            

                  series_type = params[:series_type] || 'commercial'
          
      9. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    9. 
            

            

                  
          
      10. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    10. 
            

            

                  response = InvoiceNumberingService.next_available(
          
      11. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    11. 
            

            

                    token: current_token,
          
      12. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    12. 
            

            

                    year: year,
          
      13. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    13. 
            

            

                    series_type: series_type
          
      14. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    14. 
            

            

                  )
          
      15. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    15. 
            

            

                  
          
      16. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    16. 
            

            

                  render json: {
          
      17. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    17. 
            

            

                    data: {
          
      18. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    18. 
            

            

                      type: 'next_available_numbers',
          
      19. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    19. 
            

            

                      attributes: response
          
      20. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    20. 
            

            

                    }
          
      21. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    21. 
            

            

                  }, status: :ok
          
      22. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    22. 
            

            

                  
          
      23. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    23. 
            

            

                rescue ApiService::ApiError => e
          
      24. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    24. 
            

            

                  render json: {
          
      25. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    25. 
            

            

                    errors: [{
          
      26. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    26. 
            

            

                      status: '422',
          
      27. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    27. 
            

            

                      title: 'API Error',
          
      28. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    28. 
            

            

                      detail: e.message
          
      29. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    29. 
            

            

                    }]
          
      30. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    30. 
            

            

                  }, status: :unprocessable_content
          
      31. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    31. 
            

            

                  
          
      32. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    32. 
            

            

                rescue => e
          
      33. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    33. 
            

            

                  Rails.logger.error "Error fetching next available numbers: #{e.message}"
          
      34. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    34. 
            

            

                  render json: {
          
      35. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    35. 
            

            

                    errors: [{
          
      36. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    36. 
            

            

                      status: '500',
          
      37. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    37.

                      detail: 'Unable to fetch next available numbers'
          
      39. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    39.

      40. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    40. 
            

            

                  }, status: :internal_server_error
          
      41. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    41. 
            

            

                end
          
      42. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    42. 
            

            

              end
          
      43. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    43. 
            

            

            end

              def debug_request
          
      27. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    27. 
            

            

                Rails.logger.info "DEBUG: Processing #{request.method} #{request.path}"
          
      28. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    28. 
            

            

                Rails.logger.info "DEBUG: Controller: #{self.class.name}"
          
      29. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    29. 
            

            

                Rails.logger.info "DEBUG: Action: #{action_name}"
          
      30. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    30. 
            

            

                Rails.logger.info "DEBUG: Current token: #{session[:access_token].present? ? 'present' : 'nil'}"
          
      31. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    31. 
            

            

              rescue => e
          
      32.

      33.

                Rails.logger.error "DEBUG BACKTRACE: #{e.backtrace.first(5).join('\n')}"

              def authenticate_user!
          
      38. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    38. 
            

            

                Rails.logger.info "DEBUG: authenticate_user! called for #{request.path}"
          
      39. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    39. 
            

            

                return if request.path == login_path # Don't authenticate on login page itself
          
      40. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    40. 
            

            

                
          
      41. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    41. 
            

            

                unless logged_in?
          
      42. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    42. 
            

            

                  Rails.logger.info "DEBUG: User not logged in, redirecting to login"
          
      43. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    43. 
            

            

                  redirect_to login_path, alert: 'Please sign in to continue'

              def authenticate_api_user!
          
      52. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    52. 
            

            

                Rails.logger.info "DEBUG: authenticate_api_user! called for #{request.path}"

      54.

      56.

                  render json: {

              def logged_in?
          
      81. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    81. 
            

            

                Rails.logger.info "DEBUG: logged_in? called"
          
      82. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    82. 
            

            

                has_token = current_token.present?
          
      83. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    83. 
            

            

                Rails.logger.info "DEBUG: current_token present: #{has_token}"
          
      84. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    84. 
            

            

                
          
      85. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    85. 
            

            

                return false unless has_token
          
      86. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    86. 
            

            

                
          
      87. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    87. 
            

            

                token_valid = valid_token?
          
      88. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    88. 
            

            

                Rails.logger.info "DEBUG: valid_token?: #{token_valid}"
          
      89. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    89. 
            

            

                
          
      90. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    90. 
            

            

                has_token && token_valid
          
      91. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    91. 
            

            

              rescue => e
          
      92. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    92. 
            

            

                Rails.logger.error "DEBUG: logged_in? error: #{e.message}"
          
      93. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    93. 
            

            

                Rails.logger.error "DEBUG: logged_in? backtrace: #{e.backtrace.first(5).join('\n')}"
          
      94. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    94. 
            

            

                false

    95. 
            

            

              end
          
      96.

              def current_token

              def current_user
          
      111. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    111. 
            

            

                return nil unless logged_in?
          
      112. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    112. 
            

            

                
          
      113. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    113. 
            

            

                @current_user ||= {
          
      114. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    114. 
            

            

                  id: session[:user_id],
          
      115. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    115. 
            

            

                  email: session[:user_email],
          
      116. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    116. 
            

            

                  name: session[:user_name],
          
      117. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    117. 
            

            

                  company_id: session[:company_id],
          
      118. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    118. 
            

            

                  companies: session[:companies] || []
          
      119. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    119. 
            

            

                }
          
      120. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    120. 
            

            

              end
          
      121.

      122.

              def current_company_id
          
      123. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    123. 
            

            

                session[:company_id]
          
      124. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    124. 
            

            

              end
          
      125.

    126. 
            

            

              def current_company
          
      127. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    127. 
            

            

                return nil unless current_company_id
          
      128. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    128. 
            

            

                
          
      129. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    129. 
            

            

                @current_company ||= session[:companies]&.find { |c| c['id'] == current_company_id || c[:id] == current_company_id }
          
      130. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    130. 
            

            

              end
          
      131. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    131. 
            

            

              
          
      132.

              def user_companies
          
      133. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    133. 
            

            

                session[:companies] || []
          
      134. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    134. 
            

            

              end
          
      135. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    135. 
            

            

              
          
      136. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    136. 
            

            

              def valid_token?
          
      137. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    137. 
            

            

                Rails.logger.info "DEBUG: valid_token? called"
          
      138. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    138. 
            

            

                return false unless current_token.present?
          
      139. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    139. 
            

            

                
          
      140. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    140. 
            

            

                # Cache token validation result for the duration of the request
          
      141. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    141. 
            

            

                return @token_valid_cache if defined?(@token_valid_cache)
          
      142. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    142. 
            

            

                
          
      143. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    143. 
            

            

                begin
          
      144. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    144. 
            

            

                  Rails.logger.info "DEBUG: Calling AuthService.validate_token"
          
      145. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    145. 
            

            

                  result = AuthService.validate_token(current_token)
          
      146. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    146. 
            

            

                  Rails.logger.info "DEBUG: AuthService.validate_token returned: #{result.inspect}"
          
      147. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    147. 
            

            

                  
          
      148. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    148. 
            

            

                  if result
          
      149. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    149. 
            

            

                    @token_valid_cache = true
          
      150. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    150. 
            

            

                    true
          
      151. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    151. 
            

            

                  else
          
      152. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    152. 
            

            

                    Rails.logger.info "DEBUG: Token invalid, trying refresh"
          
      153. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    153. 
            

            

                    @token_valid_cache = try_token_refresh
          
      154. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    154. 
            

            

                    @token_valid_cache
          
      155. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    155. 
            

            

                  end
          
      156. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    156. 
            

            

                rescue => e
          
      157. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    157. 
            

            

                  Rails.logger.error "DEBUG: valid_token? error: #{e.message}"
          
      158. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    158. 
            

            

                  Rails.logger.error "DEBUG: valid_token? backtrace: #{e.backtrace.first(5).join('\n')}"
          
      159. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    159. 
            

            

                  @token_valid_cache = false
          
      160. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    160. 
            

            

                  false
          
      161. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    161. 
            

            

                end
          
      162. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    162. 
            

            

              end
          
      163. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    163. 
            

            

              
          
      164. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    164. 
            

            

              def try_token_refresh
          
      165. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    165. 
            

            

                return false unless session[:refresh_token].present?
          
      166. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    166. 
            

            

                
          
      167. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    167. 
            

            

                begin
          
      168. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    168. 
            

            

                  auth_response = AuthService.refresh_token(session[:refresh_token])
          
      169. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    169. 
            

            

                  
          
      170. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    170. 
            

            

                  if auth_response
          
      171. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    171. 
            

            

                    session[:access_token] = auth_response[:access_token]
          
      172. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    172. 
            

            

                    session[:refresh_token] = auth_response[:refresh_token] if auth_response[:refresh_token]
          
      173. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    173. 
            

            

                    @current_token = auth_response[:access_token]
          
      174. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    174. 
            

            

                    # Clear token validation cache since we have a new token
          
      175. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    175. 
            

            

                    @token_valid_cache = nil
          
      176. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    176. 
            

            

                    true
          
      177. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    177. 
            

            

                  else
          
      178. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    178. 
            

            

                    false
          
      179. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    179. 
            

            

                  end
          
      180. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    180. 
            

            

                rescue => e
          
      181. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    181. 
            

            

                  Rails.logger.error "Token refresh failed: #{e.message}"
          
      182. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    182. 
            

            

                  false
          
      183. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    183. 
            

            

                end
          
      184. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    184. 
            

            

              end
          
      185. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    185. 
            

            

              
          
      186. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    186. 
            

            

              def clear_session
          
      187. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    187. 
            

            

                session[:access_token] = nil
          
      188. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    188. 
            

            

                session[:refresh_token] = nil
          
      189. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    189. 
            

            

                session[:user_id] = nil
          
      190. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    190. 
            

            

                session[:user_email] = nil
          
      191. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    191. 
            

            

                session[:user_name] = nil
          
      192. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    192. 
            

            

                session[:company_id] = nil
          
      193. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    193. 
            

            

                session[:companies] = nil
          
      194. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    194. 
            

            

                @current_token = nil
          
      195. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    195. 
            

            

                @current_user = nil
          
      196. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    196. 
            

            

                @current_company = nil
          
      197.

                @token_valid_cache = nil
          
      198. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    198. 
            

            

              end
          
      199.

              # Permission helpers
          
      201. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    201. 
            

            

              def current_user_role
          
      202. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    202. 
            

            

                return nil unless current_company_id && user_companies.present?
          
      203. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    203. 
            

            

                
          
      204. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    204. 
            

            

                company = user_companies.find { |c| (c['id'] || c[:id]) == current_company_id }
          
      205. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    205. 
            

            

                company ? (company['role'] || company[:role]) : nil
          
      206. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    206. 
            

            

              end
          
      207. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    207. 
            

            

              
          
      208. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    208. 
            

            

              def can?(action, resource = nil)
          
      209. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    209. 
            

            

                role = current_user_role
          
      210. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    210. 
            

            

                return false unless role
          
      211. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    211. 
            

            

                
          
      212. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    212. 
            

            

                case role
          
      213. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    213. 
            

            

                when 'owner'
          
      214. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    214. 
            

            

                  true # Owners can do everything
          
      215. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    215. 
            

            

                when 'admin'
          
      216. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    216. 
            

            

                  # Admins can do most things except manage owners
          
      217. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    217. 
            

            

                  ![:manage_owners, :delete_company].include?(action)
          
      218. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    218. 
            

            

                when 'manager'
          
      219. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    219. 
            

            

                  [:view, :create, :edit, :approve, :manage_invoices, :manage_workflows].include?(action)
          
      220. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    220. 
            

            

                when 'accountant'
          
      221. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    221. 
            

            

                  [:view, :create, :edit, :manage_invoices, :export, :generate_reports].include?(action)
          
      222. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    222. 
            

            

                when 'reviewer'
          
      223. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    223. 
            

            

                  [:view, :review, :approve].include?(action)
          
      224. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    224. 
            

            

                when 'submitter'
          
      225. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    225. 
            

            

                  [:view, :create, :submit].include?(action)
          
      226. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    226. 
            

            

                when 'viewer'
          
      227. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    227. 
            

            

                  [:view].include?(action)
          
      228. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    228. 
            

            

                else
          
      229. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    229. 
            

            

                  false
          
      230. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    230. 
            

            

                end
          
      231. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    231. 
            

            

              end
          
      232. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    232. 
            

            

              
          
      233. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    233. 
            

            

              def ensure_can!(action, resource = nil)
          
      234. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    234. 
            

            

                unless can?(action, resource)
          
      235. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    235. 
            

            

                  redirect_to dashboard_path, alert: 'You do not have permission to perform this action.'
          
      236. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    236. 
            

            

                end
          
      237. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    237. 
            

            

              end
          
      238. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    238. 
            

            

              
          
      239. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    239. 
            

            

              helper_method :current_user, :logged_in?, :user_signed_in?, :current_company, :current_company_id, :user_companies, :current_user_role, :can?, :current_token
          
      240. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    240. 
            

            

              
          
      241. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    241. 
            

            

              def log_action_execution
          
      242. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    242. 
            

            

                Rails.logger.info "AROUND_ACTION: Starting #{controller_name}##{action_name}"
          
      243. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    243. 
            

            

                begin
          
      244. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    244. 
            

            

                  yield
          
      245. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    245. 
            

            

                  Rails.logger.info "AROUND_ACTION: Completed #{controller_name}##{action_name} with status #{response.status}"
          
      246. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    246. 
            

            

                rescue => e
          
      247. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    247. 
            

            

                  Rails.logger.error "AROUND_ACTION: Error in #{controller_name}##{action_name}: #{e.class} - #{e.message}"
          
      248. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    248. 
            

            

                  raise
          
      249. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    249. 
            

            

                end
          
      250. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    250. 
            

            

              end
          
      251. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    251. 
            

            

            end
          
      252.

    app/controllers/companies_controller.rb

    0.0% lines covered

    174 relevant lines. 0 lines covered and 174 lines missed.

              before_action :set_company, only: [:show, :edit, :update, :destroy]

              skip_before_action :authenticate_user!, only: [:select, :switch]
          
      4.

              before_action :ensure_logged_in, only: [:select, :switch]

              def select
          
      7. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    7. 
            

            

                Rails.logger.info "DEBUG: CompaniesController#select called"
          
      8. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    8. 
            

            

                @companies = user_companies
          
      9. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    9. 
            

            

                
          
      10. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    10. 
            

            

                if @companies.empty?
          
      11. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    11. 
            

            

                  Rails.logger.error "DEBUG: User has no companies!"
          
      12. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    12. 
            

            

                  redirect_to login_path, alert: 'No companies found for your account'
          
      13. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    13. 
            

            

                elsif @companies.size == 1
          
      14. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    14. 
            

            

                  # Auto-select if only one company
          
      15. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    15. 
            

            

                  switch_to_company(@companies.first['id'] || @companies.first[:id])
          
      16. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    16. 
            

            

                end
          
      17. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    17. 
            

            

              end
          
      18.

              def switch
          
      20. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    20. 
            

            

                Rails.logger.info "DEBUG: CompaniesController#switch called with params: #{params.inspect}"
          
      21. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    21. 
            

            

                company_id = params[:company_id]
          
      22. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    22. 
            

            

                
          
      23. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    23. 
            

            

                if company_id.blank?
          
      24. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    24. 
            

            

                  redirect_to select_company_path, alert: 'Please select a company'

      26.

      30.

              def index
          
      32. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    32. 
            

            

                @page = params[:page] || 1
          
      33. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    33. 
            

            

                @per_page = params[:per_page] || 25
          
      34. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    34. 
            

            

                @search = params[:search]
          
      35. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    35. 
            

            

                
          
      36. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    36. 
            

            

                begin
          
      37. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    37. 
            

            

                  response = CompanyService.all(
          
      38. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    38. 
            

            

                    token: current_token,
          
      39. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    39. 
            

            

                    params: {

                      page: @page,

    42. 
            

            

                      search: @search
          
      43. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    43. 
            

            

                    }.compact
          
      44. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    44. 
            

            

                  )
          
      45. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    45. 
            

            

                  
          
      46. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    46. 
            

            

                  @companies = response[:companies] || []
          
      47. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    47. 
            

            

                  @total_count = response[:meta] ? response[:meta][:total] : response[:total]
          
      48. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    48. 
            

            

                  @current_page = response[:meta][:page] if response[:meta]
          
      49. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    49. 
            

            

                  @total_pages = response[:meta][:pages] if response[:meta]
          
      50. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    50. 
            

            

                  
          
      51. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    51. 
            

            

                  # Debug: log the company data to see what's being loaded
          
      52. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    52. 
            

            

                  Rails.logger.info "DEBUG: Loaded companies: #{@companies.inspect}"
          
      53. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    53. 
            

            

                rescue ApiService::AuthenticationError => e
          
      54. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    54. 
            

            

                  clear_session
          
      55. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    55. 
            

            

                  redirect_to login_path, alert: 'Please sign in to continue'
          
      56. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    56. 
            

            

                rescue ApiService::ApiError => e
          
      57. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    57. 
            

            

                  @companies = []
          
      58. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    58. 
            

            

                  flash.now[:alert] = "Error loading companies: #{e.message}"
          
      59. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    59. 
            

            

                end
          
      60. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    60. 
            

            

              end
          
      61.

              def show

              def new

                @company = {

              def create
          
      84. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    84. 
            

            

                begin
          
      85. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    85. 
            

            

                  Rails.logger.info "DEBUG: CompaniesController#create starting"
          
      86. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    86. 
            

            

                  response = CompanyService.create(company_params, token: current_token)
          
      87. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    87. 
            

            

                  Rails.logger.info "DEBUG: CompanyService.create returned: #{response.inspect}"
          
      88. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    88. 
            

            

                  
          
      89. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    89. 
            

            

                  # Extract ID from JSON API format response
          
      90. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    90. 
            

            

                  company_id = response.dig(:data, :id) || response[:id]
          
      91. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    91. 
            

            

                  Rails.logger.info "DEBUG: Extracted company_id: #{company_id}"
          
      92. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    92. 
            

            

                  
          
      93. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    93. 
            

            

                  redirect_to company_path(company_id), notice: 'Company was successfully created.'
          
      94. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    94. 
            

            

                  Rails.logger.info "DEBUG: Redirect to company_path(#{company_id}) initiated"
          
      95. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    95. 
            

            

                rescue ApiService::ValidationError => e
          
      96. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    96. 
            

            

                  Rails.logger.info "DEBUG: ValidationError caught: #{e.message}, errors: #{e.errors}"
          
      97. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    97. 
            

            

                  @company = company_params
          
      98. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    98. 
            

            

                  @errors = e.errors
          
      99. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    99. 
            

            

                  flash.now[:alert] = 'There were errors creating the company.'
          
      100. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    100. 
            

            

                  render :new, status: :unprocessable_content
          
      101. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    101. 
            

            

                rescue ApiService::ApiError => e
          
      102. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    102. 
            

            

                  Rails.logger.info "DEBUG: ApiError caught: #{e.message}"
          
      103. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    103. 
            

            

                  @company = company_params
          
      104. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    104. 
            

            

                  flash.now[:alert] = "Error creating company: #{e.message}"
          
      105. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    105. 
            

            

                  render :new, status: :unprocessable_content
          
      106. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    106. 
            

            

                rescue => e
          
      107. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    107. 
            

            

                  Rails.logger.info "DEBUG: Unexpected error: #{e.class}: #{e.message}"
          
      108. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    108. 
            

            

                  Rails.logger.info "DEBUG: Backtrace: #{e.backtrace[0..5].join('\n')}"
          
      109. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    109. 
            

            

                  @company = company_params
          
      110. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    110. 
            

            

                  flash.now[:alert] = "Unexpected error: #{e.message}"
          
      111. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    111. 
            

            

                  render :new, status: :unprocessable_content
          
      112. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    112. 
            

            

                end
          
      113. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    113. 
            

            

              end

              def update
          
      119. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    119. 
            

            

                begin
          
      120. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    120. 
            

            

                  CompanyService.update(@company[:id], company_params, token: current_token)
          
      121. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    121. 
            

            

                  redirect_to company_path(@company[:id]), notice: 'Company was successfully updated.'
          
      122. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    122. 
            

            

                rescue ApiService::ValidationError => e
          
      123. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    123. 
            

            

                  @errors = e.errors
          
      124. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    124. 
            

            

                  flash.now[:alert] = 'There were errors updating the company.'

    125. 
            

            

                  render :edit, status: :unprocessable_content
          
      126. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    126. 
            

            

                rescue ApiService::ApiError => e
          
      127. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    127.

      128. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    128. 
            

            

                  render :edit, status: :unprocessable_content
          
      129. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    129. 
            

            

                end
          
      130. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    130. 
            

            

              end

              def destroy

    133. 
            

            

                begin

                  CompanyService.destroy(@company[:id], token: current_token)

    135. 
            

            

                  redirect_to companies_path, notice: 'Company was successfully deleted.'
          
      136. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    136. 
            

            

                rescue ApiService::ApiError => e
          
      137. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    137. 
            

            

                  redirect_to companies_path, alert: "Error deleting company: #{e.message}"
          
      138.

                end

              end

              def set_company
          
      144. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    144. 
            

            

                begin
          
      145. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    145. 
            

            

                  @company = CompanyService.find(params[:id], token: current_token)
          
      146. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    146. 
            

            

                  Rails.logger.info "DEBUG: set_company - @company = #{@company.inspect}"
          
      147. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    147. 
            

            

                  Rails.logger.info "DEBUG: set_company - @company[:id] = #{@company[:id].inspect} (#{@company[:id].class})"
          
      148. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    148. 
            

            

                rescue ApiService::ApiError => e
          
      149. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    149. 
            

            

                  redirect_to companies_path, alert: "Company not found: #{e.message}"
          
      150. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    150. 
            

            

                end
          
      151. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    151. 
            

            

              end
          
      152. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    152. 
            

            

              
          
      153.

              def company_params
          
      154. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    154. 
            

            

                params.require(:company).permit(
          
      155. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    155. 
            

            

                  :name, :legal_name, :tax_id, :email, :phone, :website,
          
      156. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    156. 
            

            

                  :description, :notes,
          
      157. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    157.

              def ensure_logged_in
          
      163. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    163. 
            

            

                unless current_token.present?
          
      164. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    164. 
            

            

                  redirect_to login_path, alert: 'Please sign in to continue'
          
      165.

                end
          
      166.

              def switch_to_company(company_id)
          
      169. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    169. 
            

            

                begin
          
      170. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    170. 
            

            

                  Rails.logger.info "DEBUG: switch_to_company called with company_id=#{company_id} (#{company_id.class})"
          
      171. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    171. 
            

            

                  auth_response = AuthService.switch_company(current_token, company_id)
          
      172. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    172. 
            

            

                  
          
      173. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    173. 
            

            

                  if auth_response
          
      174. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    174. 
            

            

                    # Update session with new token and company info
          
      175. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    175. 
            

            

                    session[:access_token] = auth_response[:access_token]
          
      176. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    176. 
            

            

                    session[:refresh_token] = auth_response[:refresh_token] if auth_response[:refresh_token]
          
      177. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    177. 
            

            

                    session[:company_id] = auth_response[:company_id]
          
      178. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    178. 
            

            

                    session[:companies] = auth_response[:companies] if auth_response[:companies]
          
      179. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    179. 
            

            

                    
          
      180. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    180. 
            

            

                    # Get the company name by making a fresh API call to get the correct name
          
      181. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    181. 
            

            

                    company_name = 'the selected company' # default fallback
          
      182. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    182. 
            

            

                    
          
      183. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    183. 
            

            

                    begin
          
      184. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    184. 
            

            

                      company_details = CompanyService.find(company_id, token: auth_response[:access_token])
          
      185. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    185. 
            

            

                      company_name = company_details[:name] || company_details['name'] || company_name
          
      186. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    186. 
            

            

                      Rails.logger.info "DEBUG: Fetched company details: #{company_details.inspect}"
          
      187. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    187. 
            

            

                    rescue => e
          
      188. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    188. 
            

            

                      Rails.logger.info "DEBUG: Failed to fetch company details: #{e.message}"
          
      189. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    189. 
            

            

                      # Fallback to auth response or session data
          
      190. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    190. 
            

            

                      company_name = auth_response[:user]&.[](:company_name) || 
          
      191. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    191. 
            

            

                                     user_companies.find { |c| (c['id'] || c[:id]).to_s == company_id.to_s }&.[]('name') ||
          
      192. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    192. 
            

            

                                     user_companies.find { |c| (c['id'] || c[:id]).to_s == company_id.to_s }&.[](:name) ||
          
      193. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    193. 
            

            

                                     company_name
          
      194. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    194. 
            

            

                    end
          
      195. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    195. 
            

            

                    
          
      196. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    196. 
            

            

                    Rails.logger.info "DEBUG: Final company_name = #{company_name}"
          
      197. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    197. 
            

            

                    redirect_to dashboard_path, notice: "Successfully switched to #{company_name}"
          
      198. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    198. 
            

            

                  else
          
      199. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    199. 
            

            

                    redirect_to select_company_path, alert: 'Failed to switch company'
          
      200. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    200. 
            

            

                  end
          
      201. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    201. 
            

            

                rescue => e
          
      202. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    202. 
            

            

                  Rails.logger.error "Company switch error: #{e.message}"
          
      203. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    203. 
            

            

                  redirect_to select_company_path, alert: 'An error occurred while switching companies'
          
      204. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    204. 
            

            

                end
          
      205. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    205. 
            

            

              end
          
      206. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    206. 
            

            

            end
          
      207.

    0.0% lines covered

    151 relevant lines. 0 lines covered and 151 lines missed.

              def index
          
      6. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    6. 
            

            

                @page = params[:page] || 1
          
      7. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    7. 
            

            

                @per_page = params[:per_page] || 25
          
      8. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    8. 
            

            

                @search = params[:search]
          
      9. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    9. 
            

            

                
          
      10. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    10. 
            

            

                begin
          
      11. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    11. 
            

            

                  response = CompanyContactsService.all(
          
      12. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    12. 
            

            

                    company_id: @company[:id],
          
      13. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    13.

    14.

      15.

      19. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    19. 
            

            

                  )
          
      20. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    20. 
            

            

                  
          
      21. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    21. 
            

            

                  @contacts = response[:contacts] || []
          
      22. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    22. 
            

            

                  @total_count = response[:meta] ? response[:meta][:total] : 0
          
      23. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    23. 
            

            

                  @current_page = response[:meta][:page] if response[:meta]
          
      24. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    24. 
            

            

                  @total_pages = response[:meta][:pages] if response[:meta]
          
      25. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    25. 
            

            

                rescue ApiService::AuthenticationError => e
          
      26. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    26. 
            

            

                  clear_session
          
      27. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    27. 
            

            

                  redirect_to login_path, alert: 'Please sign in to continue'
          
      28. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    28. 
            

            

                rescue ApiService::ApiError => e
          
      29.

                  @contacts = []

      31.

                end

              def set_company

              def set_company_contact
          
      146. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    146. 
            

            

                begin
          
      147. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    147. 
            

            

                  @contact = CompanyContactsService.find(
          
      148. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    148. 
            

            

                    company_id: @company[:id],
          
      149. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    149. 
            

            

                    id: params[:id],
          
      150. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    150. 
            

            

                    token: current_token
          
      151. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    151. 
            

            

                  )
          
      152. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    152. 
            

            

                rescue ApiService::ApiError => e
          
      153. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    153. 
            

            

                  redirect_to company_company_contacts_path(@company[:id]), 
          
      154. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    154. 
            

            

                              alert: "Contact not found: #{e.message}"
          
      155. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    155. 
            

            

                end
          
      156. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    156. 
            

            

              end
          
      157. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    157. 
            

            

              
          
      158. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    158. 
            

            

              def contact_params
          
      159. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    159. 
            

            

                params.require(:company_contact).permit(
          
      160. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    160. 
            

            

                  :name, :legal_name, :tax_id, :email, :phone, :website,
          
      161. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    161. 
            

            

                  addresses: [
          
      162. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    162. 
            

            

                    :address_type, :street_address, :city, :postal_code, :state_province, :country_code, :is_default
          
      163. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    163. 
            

            

                  ]
          
      164. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    164. 
            

            

                )
          
      165. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    165. 
            

            

              end
          
      166.

            end

            class DashboardController < ApplicationController
          
      2. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    2. 
            

            

              def index
          
      3. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    3. 
            

            

                Rails.logger.info " DASHBOARD DEBUG: Starting dashboard#index"
          
      4. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    4. 
            

            

                
          
      5. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    5. 
            

            

                begin
          
      6. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    6. 
            

            

                  Rails.logger.info " DASHBOARD DEBUG: Getting current_user"
          
      7. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    7. 
            

            

                  @user = current_user
          
      8. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    8. 
            

            

                  Rails.logger.info " DASHBOARD DEBUG: @user = #{@user.inspect}"
          
      9. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    9. 
            

            

                  
          
      10. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    10. 
            

            

                  Rails.logger.info " DASHBOARD DEBUG: Getting user_companies"
          
      11. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    11. 
            

            

                  companies = user_companies
          
      12. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    12. 
            

            

                  Rails.logger.info " DASHBOARD DEBUG: user_companies = #{companies.inspect}"
          
      13. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    13. 
            

            

                  
          
      14. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    14. 
            

            

                  # Check if user has any companies assigned
          
      15. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    15. 
            

            

                  if companies.empty?
          
      16. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    16. 
            

            

                    Rails.logger.info " DASHBOARD DEBUG: No companies found, redirecting"
          
      17. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    17. 
            

            

                    redirect_to login_path, alert: 'No companies found for your account. Please contact an administrator.'
          
      18. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    18. 
            

            

                    return
          
      19. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    19. 
            

            

                  end
          
      20. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    20. 
            

            

                  
          
      21. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    21. 
            

            

                  Rails.logger.info " DASHBOARD DEBUG: Setting up stats"
          
      22. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    22. 
            

            

                  # Stats endpoint doesn't exist in API, use defaults
          
      23. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    23. 
            

            

                  @stats = { total_invoices: 0, draft_count: 0, sent_count: 0, paid_count: 0, total_amount: 0, pending_amount: 0 }
          
      24. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    24. 
            

            

                  
          
      25. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    25. 
            

            

                  Rails.logger.info " DASHBOARD DEBUG: Getting current_token"
          
      26. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    26. 
            

            

                  token = current_token
          
      27. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    27. 
            

            

                  Rails.logger.info " DASHBOARD DEBUG: current_token = #{token.inspect}"
          
      28. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    28. 
            

            

                  
          
      29. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    29. 
            

            

                  Rails.logger.info " DASHBOARD DEBUG: Calling InvoiceService.recent"
          
      30. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    30. 
            

            

                  # Recent invoices should still work
          
      31. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    31. 
            

            

                  @recent_invoices = InvoiceService.recent(token: token, limit: 5)
          
      32. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    32. 
            

            

                  Rails.logger.info " DASHBOARD DEBUG: @recent_invoices = #{@recent_invoices.inspect}"
          
      33. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    33. 
            

            

                  
          
      34. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    34. 
            

            

                  Rails.logger.info " DASHBOARD DEBUG: Dashboard#index completed successfully"
          
      35. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    35. 
            

            

                rescue ApiService::AuthenticationError => e
          
      36. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    36. 
            

            

                  Rails.logger.error " DASHBOARD DEBUG: AuthenticationError: #{e.message}"
          
      37. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    37. 
            

            

                  Rails.logger.error " DASHBOARD DEBUG: #{e.backtrace.first(5).join('\n')}"
          
      38. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    38. 
            

            

                  clear_session
          
      39. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    39. 
            

            

                  redirect_to login_path, alert: 'Your session has expired. Please login again.'
          
      40. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    40. 
            

            

                rescue => e
          
      41. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    41. 
            

            

                  Rails.logger.error " DASHBOARD DEBUG: General error: #{e.class} - #{e.message}"
          
      42. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    42. 
            

            

                  Rails.logger.error " DASHBOARD DEBUG: #{e.backtrace.first(10).join('\n')}"
          
      43. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    43. 
            

            

                  @stats = { total_invoices: 0, draft_count: 0, sent_count: 0, paid_count: 0, total_amount: 0, pending_amount: 0 }
          
      44. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    44. 
            

            

                  @recent_invoices = []
          
      45. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    45. 
            

            

                  raise e  # Re-raise so we can see the full error in test
          
      46. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    46. 
            

            

                end
          
      47. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    47. 
            

            

              end
          
      48. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    48. 
            

            

            end
          
      49.

            class InvoiceSeriesController < ApplicationController

              before_action :authenticate_user!

              before_action :set_company

              before_action :set_invoice_series, only: [:show, :edit, :update, :destroy, :activate, :deactivate, :statistics, :compliance]
          
      5. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    5. 
            

            

              
          
      6.

              def index
          
      7. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    7. 
            

            

                filters = {
          
      8. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    8. 
            

            

                  year: params[:year],
          
      9. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    9. 
            

            

                  series_type: params[:series_type],
          
      10. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    10. 
            

            

                  active_only: params[:active_only]
          
      11. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    11. 
            

            

                }
          
      12. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    12. 
            

            

                
          
      13. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    13. 
            

            

                result = InvoiceSeriesService.all(token: current_token, filters: filters)
          
      14. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    14. 
            

            

                @invoice_series = result || []
          
      15. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    15. 
            

            

                @years = (2020..Date.current.year + 1).to_a.reverse
          
      16. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    16. 
            

            

                @series_types = InvoiceSeriesService.series_types
          
      17. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    17. 
            

            

              rescue ApiService::ApiError => e

    19. 
            

            

                flash[:alert] = "Failed to load invoice series: #{e.message}"

    20. 
            

            

                @invoice_series = []

                @years = (2020..Date.current.year + 1).to_a.reverse

              def show

              def create

    44.

    45. 
            

            

                  series_code: params[:invoice_series][:series_code],

    49.

    50. 
            

            

                  is_active: params[:invoice_series][:is_active] == '1',

    62.

    65. 
            

            

                end
          
      66.

              rescue ApiService::ValidationError => e

              def update

              def destroy

    119.

              def activate

              rescue ApiService::ApiError => e

    131. 
            

            

                flash[:alert] = "Failed to activate invoice series: #{e.message}"
          
      132. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    132. 
            

            

                redirect_to company_invoice_series_path(@company[:id], @invoice_series[:id])
          
      133. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    133. 
            

            

              end
          
      134. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    134.

              def deactivate
          
      136. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    136. 
            

            

                InvoiceSeriesService.deactivate(
          
      137. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    137. 
            

            

                  @invoice_series[:id],

    143.
