              def statistics
          
      151. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    151. 
            

            

                @statistics = InvoiceSeriesService.statistics(@invoice_series[:id], token: current_token)

    152.

    153. 
            

            

              rescue ApiService::ApiError => e

              def compliance

              def rollover
          
      165. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    165. 
            

            

                result = InvoiceSeriesService.rollover(
          
      166. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    166. 
            

            

                  params[:id],
          
      167. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    167. 
            

            

                  token: current_token,
          
      168. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    168. 
            

            

                  new_year: params[:new_year]
          
      169. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    169. 
            

            

                )
          
      170. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    170. 
            

            

                
          
      171. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    171. 
            

            

                if result[:new_series]
          
      172. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    172. 
            

            

                  flash[:notice] = "Series rolled over successfully to year #{params[:new_year]}"
          
      173. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    173. 
            

            

                  redirect_to company_invoice_series_path(@company[:id], result[:new_series][:id])
          
      174. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    174. 
            

            

                else
          
      175. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    175. 
            

            

                  flash[:notice] = "Series rolled over successfully to year #{params[:new_year]}"
          
      176. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    176. 
            

            

                  redirect_to company_invoice_series_index_path(@company[:id], year: params[:new_year])
          
      177. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    177. 
            

            

                end
          
      178. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    178. 
            

            

              rescue ApiService::ApiError => e
          
      179. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    179. 
            

            

                flash[:alert] = "Failed to rollover series: #{e.message}"
          
      180. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    180. 
            

            

                redirect_to company_invoice_series_index_path(@company[:id])
          
      181. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    181. 
            

            

              end
          
      182. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    182. 
            

            

              
          
      183. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    183. 
            

            

              private
          
      184.

              def set_company
          
      186. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    186. 
            

            

                @company = CompanyService.find(params[:company_id], token: current_token)
          
      187. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    187. 
            

            

              rescue ApiService::ApiError => e
          
      188. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    188. 
            

            

                flash[:error] = "Company not found"
          
      189. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    189. 
            

            

                redirect_to companies_path
          
      190. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    190. 
            

            

              end
          
      191. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    191. 
            

            

              
          
      192. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    192. 
            

            

              def set_invoice_series
          
      193. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    193. 
            

            

                @invoice_series = InvoiceSeriesService.find(params[:id], token: current_token)
          
      194. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    194. 
            

            

              rescue ApiService::ApiError => e
          
      195. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    195. 
            

            

                flash[:alert] = "Invoice series not found"
          
      196. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    196. 
            

            

                redirect_to company_invoice_series_index_path(@company[:id])
          
      197. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    197. 
            

            

              end
          
      198. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    198. 
            

            

            end

              def new

              def create
          
      77. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    77. 
            

            

                begin
          
      78.

      79. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    79. 
            

            

                  Rails.logger.info "DEBUG: Raw params: #{params.inspect}"
          
      80. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    80. 
            

            

                  Rails.logger.info "DEBUG: Invoice params: #{invoice_params.inspect}"
          
      81. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    81. 
            

            

                  
          
      82.

                  # Process invoice lines

    84.

    85.

      87.

      88.

      89.

                rescue ApiService::ValidationError => e

      93.

                  @invoice = invoice_params
          
      94.

    95. 
            

            

            
          
      96. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    96. 
            

            

                  # Preserve buyer selection from original form submission

    97. 
            

            

                  if params[:buyer_selection].present?

    98. 
            

            

                    type, id = params[:buyer_selection].split(':')

    99. 
            

            

                    if type == 'company'
          
      100. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    100. 
            

            

                      @invoice[:buyer_party_id] = id
          
      101. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    101. 
            

            

                      @invoice[:buyer_company_contact_id] = nil
          
      102. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    102. 
            

            

                    elsif type == 'contact'
          
      103. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    103. 
            

            

                      @invoice[:buyer_party_id] = nil
          
      104. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    104. 
            

            

                      @invoice[:buyer_company_contact_id] = id
          
      105. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    105. 
            

            

                    end
          
      106. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    106. 
            

            

                  end

    107. 
            

            

            
          
      108. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    108. 
            

            

                  # Parse API errors into a format the view can understand
          
      109. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    109.

      110.

      111.

      118.

      119.

                  @invoice = invoice_params
          
      120.

      134. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    134. 
            

            

                  load_companies
          
      135. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    135. 
            

            

                  load_invoice_series
          
      136. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    136. 
            

            

                  load_all_company_contacts
          
      137. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    137. 
            

            

                  flash.now[:alert] = "Error creating invoice: #{e.message}"
          
      138. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    138. 
            

            

                  render :new, status: :unprocessable_content
          
      139. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    139. 
            

            

                rescue => e
          
      140. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    140. 
            

            

                  Rails.logger.error "DEBUG: Unexpected error in create: #{e.class} - #{e.message}"
          
      141. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    141. 
            

            

                  Rails.logger.error "DEBUG: Backtrace: #{e.backtrace.first(5).join("\n")}"
          
      142. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    142. 
            

            

                  @invoice = invoice_params
          
      143. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    143. 
            

            

                  flash.now[:alert] = "Unexpected error: #{e.message}"
          
      144. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    144. 
            

            

                  render :new, status: :unprocessable_content
          
      145. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    145. 
            

            

                end
          
      146. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    146. 
            

            

              end
          
      147. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    147. 
            

            

              
          
      148. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    148. 
            

            

              def edit
          
      149. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    149. 
            

            

                @invoice[:invoice_lines] ||= [build_empty_line_item]
          
      150. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    150. 
            

            

                
          
      151. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    151. 
            

            

                load_companies
          
      152. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    152. 
            

            

                load_invoice_series
          
      153. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    153. 
            

            

                load_all_company_contacts
          
      154. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    154. 
            

            

              end
          
      155. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    155. 
            

            

              
          
      156. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    156. 
            

            

              def update
          
      157. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    157. 
            

            

                begin
          
      158. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    158. 
            

            

                  invoice_params_with_lines = process_invoice_params(invoice_params)
          
      159. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    159. 
            

            

                  
          
      160. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    160. 
            

            

                  InvoiceService.update(@invoice[:id], invoice_params_with_lines, token: current_token)
          
      161. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    161. 
            

            

                  redirect_to invoice_path(@invoice[:id]), notice: 'Invoice updated successfully'
          
      162. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    162. 
            

            

                rescue ApiService::ValidationError => e
          
      163. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    163. 
            

            

                  # Parse API errors into a format the view can understand
          
      164. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    164. 
            

            

                  @errors = parse_validation_errors(e.errors)
          
      165. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    165. 
            

            

                  @invoice[:invoice_lines] = params[:invoice][:invoice_lines]&.values || @invoice[:invoice_lines]
          
      166. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    166. 
            

            

                  load_companies
          
      167. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    167. 
            

            

                  load_invoice_series
          
      168. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    168. 
            

            

                  load_all_company_contacts
          
      169. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    169. 
            

            

                  flash.now[:alert] = 'Please fix the errors below.'
          
      170. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    170. 
            

            

                  render :edit, status: :unprocessable_content
          
      171. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    171. 
            

            

                rescue ApiService::ApiError => e
          
      172. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    172. 
            

            

                  @invoice[:invoice_lines] = params[:invoice][:invoice_lines]&.values || @invoice[:invoice_lines]
          
      173. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    173. 
            

            

                  load_companies
          
      174. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    174. 
            

            

                  load_invoice_series
          
      175. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    175. 
            

            

                  load_all_company_contacts
          
      176. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    176. 
            

            

                  flash.now[:alert] = "Error updating invoice: #{e.message}"
          
      177. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    177. 
            

            

                  render :edit, status: :unprocessable_content
          
      178. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    178. 
            

            

                end
          
      179. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    179. 
            

            

              end
          
      180. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    180. 
            

            

              
          
      181. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    181. 
            

            

              def destroy
          
      182. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    182. 
            

            

                begin
          
      183. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    183. 
            

            

                  InvoiceService.delete(@invoice[:id], token: current_token)
          
      184. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    184. 
            

            

                  redirect_to invoices_path, notice: 'Invoice deleted successfully'
          
      185. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    185. 
            

            

                rescue ApiService::ApiError => e
          
      186. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    186. 
            

            

                  redirect_to invoices_path, alert: "Error deleting invoice: #{e.message}"
          
      187. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    187. 
            

            

                end
          
      188. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    188. 
            

            

              end
          
      189. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    189. 
            

            

              
          
      190. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    190. 
            

            

              def freeze
          
      191. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    191. 
            

            

                begin
          
      192. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    192. 
            

            

                  InvoiceService.freeze(@invoice[:id], token: current_token)
          
      193. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    193. 
            

            

                  redirect_to invoice_path(@invoice[:id]), notice: 'Invoice frozen'
          
      194. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    194. 
            

            

                rescue ApiService::ApiError => e
          
      195. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    195. 
            

            

                  redirect_to invoice_path(@invoice[:id]), alert: "Error freezing invoice: #{e.message}"
          
      196. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    196. 
            

            

                end
          
      197. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    197. 
            

            

              end
          
      198. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    198. 
            

            

              
          
      199. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    199. 
            

            

              def send_email
          
      200. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    200. 
            

            

                begin
          
      201. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    201. 
            

            

                  InvoiceService.send_email(@invoice[:id], params[:recipient_email], token: current_token)
          
      202. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    202. 
            

            

                  redirect_to invoice_path(@invoice[:id]), notice: 'Email sent'
          
      203. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    203. 
            

            

                rescue ApiService::ApiError => e
          
      204. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    204. 
            

            

                  redirect_to invoice_path(@invoice[:id]), alert: "Error sending invoice: #{e.message}"
          
      205. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    205. 
            

            

                end
          
      206. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    206. 
            

            

              end
          
      207. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    207. 
            

            

              
          
      208. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    208. 
            

            

              def download_pdf
          
      209. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    209. 
            

            

                begin
          
      210. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    210. 
            

            

                  pdf_data = InvoiceService.download_pdf(@invoice[:id], token: current_token)
          
      211. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    211. 
            

            

                  send_data pdf_data, 
          
      212. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    212. 
            

            

                            filename: "invoice_#{@invoice[:invoice_number]}.pdf",
          
      213. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    213. 
            

            

                            type: 'application/pdf',
          
      214. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    214. 
            

            

                            disposition: 'attachment'
          
      215. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    215. 
            

            

                rescue ApiService::ApiError => e
          
      216. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    216. 
            

            

                  redirect_to invoice_path(@invoice[:id]), alert: "Error downloading PDF: #{e.message}"
          
      217. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    217. 
            

            

                end
          
      218. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    218. 
            

            

              end
          
      219. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    219. 
            

            

              
          
      220. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    220. 
            

            

              def download_facturae
          
      221. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    221. 
            

            

                begin
          
      222. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    222. 
            

            

                  xml_data = InvoiceService.download_facturae(@invoice[:id], token: current_token)
          
      223. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    223. 
            

            

                  send_data xml_data,
          
      224. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    224. 
            

            

                            filename: "facturae_#{@invoice[:invoice_number]}.xml",
          
      225. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    225. 
            

            

                            type: 'application/xml',
          
      226. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    226. 
            

            

                            disposition: 'attachment'
          
      227. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    227. 
            

            

                rescue ApiService::ApiError => e
          
      228. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    228. 
            

            

                  redirect_to invoice_path(@invoice[:id]), alert: "Error downloading Facturae XML: #{e.message}"
          
      229. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    229. 
            

            

                end
          
      230. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    230. 
            

            

              end
          
      231. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    231. 
            

            

              
          
      232. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    232. 
            

            

              private
          
      233. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    233. 
            

            

              
          
      234. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    234. 
            

            

              def set_invoice
          
      235. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    235. 
            

            

                begin
          
      236. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    236. 
            

            

                  @invoice = InvoiceService.find(params[:id], token: current_token)
          
      237. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    237. 
            

            

                  Rails.logger.info "DEBUG: set_invoice - @invoice = #{@invoice.inspect}"
          
      238. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    238. 
            

            

                  Rails.logger.info "DEBUG: set_invoice - @invoice[:id] = #{@invoice[:id].inspect} (#{@invoice[:id].class})"
          
      239. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    239. 
            

            

                rescue ApiService::ApiError => e
          
      240. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    240. 
            

            

                  redirect_to invoices_path, alert: "Invoice not found: #{e.message}"
          
      241. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    241. 
            

            

                end
          
      242. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    242. 
            

            

              end
          
      243. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    243. 
            

            

              
          
      244. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    244. 
            

            

              def load_companies
          
      245. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    245. 
            

            

                begin
          
      246. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    246. 
            

            

                  response = CompanyService.all(token: current_token, params: { per_page: 100 })
          
      247. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    247. 
            

            

                  all_companies = response[:companies] || []
          
      248. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    248. 
            

            

            
          
      249. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    249. 
            

            

                  # Seller companies: All companies (user can select which company is selling)
          
      250. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    250. 
            

            

                  @seller_companies = all_companies
          
      251. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    251. 
            

            

            
          
      252. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    252. 
            

            

                  # For customers, load both companies and contacts separately
          
      253. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    253. 
            

            

                  @customer_companies = all_companies # Real companies
          
      254. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    254. 
            

            

            
          
      255. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    255. 
            

            

                  # Load company contacts
          
      256. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    256. 
            

            

                  if current_company_id
          
      257. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    257. 
            

            

                    begin
          
      258. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    258. 
            

            

                      contacts_response = CompanyContactsService.all(
          
      259. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    259. 
            

            

                        company_id: current_company_id,
          
      260. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    260. 
            

            

                        token: current_token,
          
      261. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    261. 
            

            

                        params: { per_page: 100 }
          
      262. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    262. 
            

            

                      )
          
      263. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    263. 
            

            

                      @customer_contacts = contacts_response[:contacts] || []
          
      264. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    264. 
            

            

                    rescue ApiService::ApiError => e
          
      265. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    265. 
            

            

                      @customer_contacts = []
          
      266. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    266. 
            

            

                      Rails.logger.warn "Error loading company contacts: #{e.message}"
          
      267. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    267. 
            

            

                    end
          
      268. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    268. 
            

            

                  else
          
      269. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    269. 
            

            

                    @customer_contacts = []
          
      270. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    270. 
            

            

                  end
          
      271. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    271. 
            

            

            
          
      272. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    272. 
            

            

                  # Create combined buyer options with type identification
          
      273. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    273. 
            

            

                  @buyer_options = []
          
      274. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    274. 
            

            

            
          
      275. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    275. 
            

            

                  # Add companies with 'company' type
          
      276. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    276. 
            

            

                  all_companies.each do |company|
          
      277. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    277. 
            

            

                    @buyer_options << {
          
      278. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    278. 
            

            

                      id: company[:id],
          
      279. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    279. 
            

            

                      name: company[:corporate_name] || company[:trade_name] || company[:name] || "Company ##{company[:id]}",
          
      280. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    280. 
            

            

                      type: 'company'
          
      281. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    281. 
            

            

                    }
          
      282. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    282. 
            

            

                  end
          
      283. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    283. 
            

            

            
          
      284. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    284. 
            

            

                  # Add contacts with 'contact' type
          
      285. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    285. 
            

            

                  @customer_contacts.each do |contact|
          
      286. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    286. 
            

            

                    @buyer_options << {
          
      287. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    287. 
            

            

                      id: contact[:id],
          
      288. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    288. 
            

            

                      name: contact[:name] || contact[:legal_name] || "Contact ##{contact[:id]}",
          
      289. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    289. 
            

            

                      type: 'contact'
          
      290. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    290. 
            

            

                    }
          
      291. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    291. 
            

            

                  end
          
      292. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    292. 
            

            

            
          
      293. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    293. 
            

            

                  # Keep @companies for backward compatibility
          
      294. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    294. 
            

            

                  @companies = all_companies
          
      295. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    295. 
            

            

                rescue ApiService::ApiError => e
          
      296. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    296. 
            

            

                  @companies = []
          
      297. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    297. 
            

            

                  @seller_companies = []
          
      298. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    298. 
            

            

                  @customer_companies = []
          
      299. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    299. 
            

            

                  @customer_contacts = []
          
      300. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    300. 
            

            

                  @buyer_options = []
          
      301. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    301. 
            

            

                  flash.now[:alert] = "Error loading companies: #{e.message}"
          
      302. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    302. 
            

            

                end
          
      303. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    303. 
            

            

              end
          
      304. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    304. 
            

            

              
          
      305. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    305. 
            

            

              def load_company_contacts(company_id = nil)
          
      306. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    306. 
            

            

                @company_contacts = {}
          
      307. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    307. 
            

            

                return unless company_id.present?
          
      308. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    308. 
            

            

                
          
      309. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    309. 
            

            

                begin
          
      310. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    310. 
            

            

                  contacts = CompanyContactsService.active_contacts(company_id: company_id, token: current_token)
          
      311. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    311. 
            

            

                  @company_contacts[company_id.to_s] = contacts
          
      312. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    312. 
            

            

                rescue ApiService::ApiError => e
          
      313. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    313. 
            

            

                  @company_contacts[company_id.to_s] = []
          
      314. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    314. 
            

            

                  Rails.logger.warn "Error loading company contacts for company #{company_id}: #{e.message}"
          
      315. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    315. 
            

            

                end
          
      316. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    316. 
            

            

              end
          
      317. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    317. 
            

            

              
          
      318. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    318. 
            

            

              def load_all_company_contacts
          
      319. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    319. 
            

            

                @company_contacts = {}
          
      320. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    320. 
            

            

                return unless @companies.present?
          
      321. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    321. 
            

            

                
          
      322. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    322. 
            

            

                @companies.each do |company|
          
      323. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    323. 
            

            

                  begin
          
      324. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    324. 
            

            

                    contacts = CompanyContactsService.active_contacts(company_id: company[:id], token: current_token)
          
      325. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    325. 
            

            

                    @company_contacts[company[:id].to_s] = contacts
          
      326. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    326. 
            

            

                  rescue ApiService::ApiError => e
          
      327. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    327. 
            

            

                    @company_contacts[company[:id].to_s] = []
          
      328. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    328. 
            

            

                    Rails.logger.warn "Error loading contacts for company #{company[:id]}: #{e.message}"
          
      329. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    329. 
            

            

                  end
          
      330. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    330. 
            

            

                end
          
      331. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    331. 
            

            

              end
          
      332. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    332. 
            

            

            
          
      333. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    333. 
            

            

              def load_invoice_series
          
      334. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    334. 
            

            

                begin
          
      335. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    335. 
            

            

                  # Load active invoice series for current year
          
      336. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    336. 
            

            

                  @invoice_series = InvoiceSeriesService.all(
          
      337. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    337. 
            

            

                    token: current_token,
          
      338. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    338. 
            

            

                    filters: {
          
      339. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    339. 
            

            

                      year: Date.current.year,
          
      340. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    340. 
            

            

                      active_only: true
          
      341. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    341. 
            

            

                    }
          
      342. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    342. 
            

            

                  )
          
      343. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    343. 
            

            

                rescue ApiService::ApiError => e
          
      344. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    344. 
            

            

                  @invoice_series = []
          
      345.

              def load_workflows

      355.

              def invoice_params
          
      363. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    363. 
            

            

                # WORKAROUND: Rails 8 seems to have a bug with :issue_date parameter filtering
          
      364. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    364. 
            

            

                # Allow it explicitly in addition to the permit list
          
      365. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    365. 
            

            

                base_params = params.require(:invoice).permit(
          
      366. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    366. 
            

            

                  :invoice_number, :invoice_series_id, :invoice_type, :issue_date, :due_date, :status,
          
      367. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    367. 
            

            

                  :seller_party_id, :buyer_party_id, :buyer_company_contact_id, :notes, :internal_notes, :payment_method,
          
      368. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    368. 
            

            

                  :payment_terms, :currency, :exchange_rate, :workflow_definition_id,
          
      369. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    369. 
            

            

                  :discount_percentage, :discount_amount,
          
      370. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    370. 
            

            

                  invoice_lines: {},  # Allow nested hash structure
          
      371. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    371.

      372. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    372. 
            

            

                )
          
      373. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    373. 
            

            

                
          
      374. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    374. 
            

            

                # Manual workaround for issue_date parameter filtering bug
          
      375. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    375. 
            

            

                if params[:invoice][:issue_date].present? && !base_params.key?(:issue_date)
          
      376. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    376. 
            

            

                  base_params[:issue_date] = params[:invoice][:issue_date]
          
      377. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    377. 
            

            

                end
          
      378. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    378.

                base_params

              def process_invoice_params(base_params)
          
      383. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    383. 
            

            

                processed_params = base_params.dup
          
      384. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    384. 
            

            

            
          
      385. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    385. 
            

            

                # Process buyer selection - override the empty buyer fields with the selected values
          
      386. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    386. 
            

            

                if params[:buyer_selection].present?
          
      387. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    387. 
            

            

                  type, id = params[:buyer_selection].split(':')
          
      388. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    388. 
            

            

                  if type == 'company'
          
      389. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    389. 
            

            

                    processed_params[:buyer_party_id] = id
          
      390. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    390. 
            

            

                    processed_params[:buyer_company_contact_id] = nil
          
      391. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    391. 
            

            

                  elsif type == 'contact'
          
      392. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    392. 
            

            

                    processed_params[:buyer_party_id] = nil
          
      393. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    393. 
            

            

                    processed_params[:buyer_company_contact_id] = id
          
      394. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    394. 
            

            

                  end
          
      395. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    395. 
            

            

                end
          
      396. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    396. 
            

            

            
          
      397. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    397. 
            

            

                # Process invoice lines
          
      398. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    398. 
            

            

                if params[:invoice][:invoice_lines].present?
          
      399. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    399. 
            

            

                  lines = params[:invoice][:invoice_lines].values.map do |line|
          
      400. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    400. 
            

            

                    next if line[:description].blank? && line[:quantity].blank?
          
      401. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    401. 
            

            

            
          
      402. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    402. 
            

            

                    {
          
      403. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    403. 
            

            

                      description: line[:description],
          
      404. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    404. 
            

            

                      quantity: line[:quantity].to_f,
          
      405. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    405. 
            

            

                      unit_price: line[:unit_price].to_f,
          
      406. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    406. 
            

            

                      tax_rate: line[:tax_rate].to_f,
          
      407. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    407. 
            

            

                      discount_percentage: line[:discount_percentage].to_f,
          
      408. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    408. 
            

            

                      product_code: line[:product_code]
          
      409. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    409. 
            

            

                    }
          
      410. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    410. 
            

            

                  end.compact
          
      411. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    411. 
            

            

            
          
      412. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    412. 
            

            

                  processed_params[:invoice_lines_attributes] = lines
          
      413. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    413. 
            

            

                end
          
      414. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    414. 
            

            

            
          
      415. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    415. 
            

            

                processed_params

      417.

              def check_permission_to_create

              def build_empty_line_item
          
      431. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    431. 
            

            

                {
          
      432. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    432. 
            

            

                  description: '',
          
      433. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    433. 
            

            

                  quantity: 1,
          
      434. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    434. 
            

            

                  unit_price: 0.0,
          
      435. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    435. 
            

            

                  tax_rate: 21.0,
          
      436. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    436. 
            

            

                  discount_percentage: 0.0,
          
      437. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    437. 
            

            

                  product_code: ''
          
      438. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    438. 
            

            

                }
          
      439. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    439. 
            

            

              end
          
      440. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    440. 
            

            

              
          
      441. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    441. 
            

            

              # Parse API validation errors into a format the view can understand
          
      442. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    442. 
            

            

              # API errors come in format: [{status: "422", source: {pointer: "/data/attributes/invoice_number"}, title: "Validation Error", detail: "Invoice number can't be blank", code: "VALIDATION_ERROR"}]
          
      443. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    443. 
            

            

              # We need to convert to: {"invoice_number" => ["can't be blank"]}
          
      444. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    444. 
            

            

              def parse_validation_errors(api_errors)
          
      445. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    445. 
            

            

                errors = {}
          
      446. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    446. 
            

            

                
          
      447. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    447. 
            

            

                return errors unless api_errors.is_a?(Array)
          
      448. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    448. 
            

            

                
          
      449. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    449. 
            

            

                api_errors.each do |error|
          
      450. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    450. 
            

            

                  next unless error.is_a?(Hash) && error[:source] && error[:source][:pointer] && error[:detail]
          
      451. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    451. 
            

            

                  
          
      452. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    452. 
            

            

                  # Extract field name from pointer like "/data/attributes/invoice_number"
          
      453. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    453. 
            

            

                  pointer = error[:source][:pointer]
          
      454. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    454. 
            

            

                  if pointer.match(%r{/data/attributes/(.+)})
          
      455. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    455. 
            

            

                    field_name = $1
          
      456. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    456. 
            

            

                    message = error[:detail]
          
      457. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    457. 
            

            

                    
          
      458. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    458. 
            

            

                    # Remove field name from the beginning of the message if it's there
          
      459. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    459. 
            

            

                    # "Invoice number can't be blank" -> "can't be blank"
          
      460. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    460. 
            

            

                    field_label = field_name.humanize.downcase
          
      461. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    461. 
            

            

                    message = message.gsub(/^#{Regexp.escape(field_label)}\s+/i, '')
          
      462. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    462. 
            

            

                    
          
      463. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    463. 
            

            

                    errors[field_name] ||= []
          
      464. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    464. 
            

            

                    errors[field_name] << message
          
      465. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    465. 
            

            

                  end
          
      466. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    466. 
            

            

                end
          
      467. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    467. 
            

            

                
          
      468. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    468. 
            

            

                errors
          
      469. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    469. 
            

            

              end
          
      470. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    470. 
            

            

              
          
      471. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    471. 
            

            

            end
          
      472.

    app/controllers/sessions_controller.rb

    0.0% lines covered

    72 relevant lines. 0 lines covered and 72 lines missed. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    1.

              def new
          
      6. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    6. 
            

            

                Rails.logger.info "DEBUG: SessionsController#new called"
          
      7. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    7. 
            

            

                if logged_in?
          
      8. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    8. 
            

            

                  Rails.logger.info "DEBUG: User already logged in, redirecting to dashboard"
          
      9. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    9. 
            

            

                  redirect_to dashboard_path

                end

    11. 
            

            

              rescue => e
          
      12.

    13. 
            

            

                Rails.logger.error "DEBUG: SessionsController#new backtrace: #{e.backtrace.first(10).join('\n')}"
          
      14. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    14. 
            

            

                raise e
          
      15. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    15. 
            

            

              end

              def create
          
      18. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    18. 
            

            

                Rails.logger.info "DEBUG: SessionsController#create - CSRF bypassed successfully!"
          
      19. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    19. 
            

            

                Rails.logger.info "DEBUG: Params: #{params.except(:password).inspect}"
          
      20. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    20. 
            

            

                
          
      21. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    21. 
            

            

                auth_response = AuthService.login(
          
      22. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    22. 
            

            

                  params[:email],
          
      23. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    23. 
            

            

                  params[:password],
          
      24. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    24. 
            

            

                  params[:company_id] # Optional company_id if user wants to select on login
          
      25.

                )
          
      26.

                Rails.logger.info "DEBUG: AuthService returned: #{auth_response ? 'SUCCESS' : 'FAILURE'}"

    28. 
            

            

                
          
      29. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    29. 
            

            

                if auth_response
          
      30.

                  store_session(auth_response)
          
      31. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    31. 
            

            

                  
          
      32. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    32. 
            

            

                  # If user has multiple companies but no default was selected, show company selector
          
      33.

                  if auth_response[:companies]&.size.to_i > 1 && auth_response[:company_id].nil?
          
      34.

                    redirect_to select_company_path, notice: 'Please select a company to continue'

    35. 
            

            

                  else
          
      36. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    36. 
            

            

                    redirect_to dashboard_path, notice: 'Successfully logged in!'
          
      37. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    37. 
            

            

                  end
          
      38. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    38. 
            

            

                else
          
      39. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    39. 
            

            

                  flash.now[:alert] = 'Invalid email or password'
          
      40. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    40. 
            

            

                  render :new, status: :unprocessable_content
          
      41. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    41. 
            

            

                end
          
      42. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    42. 
            

            

              rescue ApiService::AuthenticationError => e
          
      43. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    43. 
            

            

                Rails.logger.error "DEBUG: Authentication error in create: #{e.message}"
          
      44.

                flash.now[:alert] = 'Invalid credentials'

              def destroy
          
      53.

                  AuthService.logout(current_token) if current_token

      57. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    57. 
            

            

                ensure

    58.

              def store_session(auth_response)
          
      66. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    66. 
            

            

                session[:access_token] = auth_response[:access_token]
          
      67. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    67. 
            

            

                session[:refresh_token] = auth_response[:refresh_token]
          
      68. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    68. 
            

            

                session[:user_id] = auth_response[:user][:id] if auth_response[:user]
          
      69. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    69. 
            

            

                session[:user_email] = auth_response[:user][:email] if auth_response[:user]
          
      70. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    70. 
            

            

                session[:user_name] = auth_response[:user][:name] if auth_response[:user]
          
      71. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    71. 
            

            

                session[:company_id] = auth_response[:company_id]
          
      72. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    72. 
            

            

                session[:companies] = auth_response[:companies]
          
      73. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    73. 
            

            

              end
          
      74. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    74. 
            

            

              
          
      75. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    75. 
            

            

              def clear_session
          
      76. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    76. 
            

            

                session[:access_token] = nil
          
      77. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    77. 
            

            

                session[:refresh_token] = nil
          
      78. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    78. 
            

            

                session[:user_id] = nil
          
      79. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    79. 
            

            

                session[:user_email] = nil
          
      80. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    80. 
            

            

                session[:user_name] = nil
          
      81. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    81.

      82. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    82.

              def validate

            class TaxRatesController < ApplicationController
          
      2.

              before_action :authenticate_user!
          
      3.

      4. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    4. 
            

            

              def index
          
      5. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    5. 
            

            

                rates_response = TaxService.rates(token: current_user_token)
          
      6. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    6. 
            

            

                exemptions_response = TaxService.exemptions(token: current_user_token)
          
      7. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    7. 
            

            

                
          
      8. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    8. 
            

            

                # Extract data from JSON API format
          
      9. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    9. 
            

            

                @tax_rates = rates_response.dig('data')&.map { |rate| rate['attributes'] } || []
          
      10. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    10. 
            

            

                @exemptions = exemptions_response.dig('data')&.map { |exemption| exemption['attributes'] } || []
          
      11. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    11. 
            

            

                
          
      12. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    12. 
            

            

                respond_to do |format|
          
      13. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    13. 
            

            

                  format.html
          
      14. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    14. 
            

            

                  format.json { render json: { tax_rates: @tax_rates, exemptions: @exemptions } }
          
      15. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    15. 
            

            

                end
          
      16. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    16. 
            

            

              rescue ApiService::ApiError => e
          
      17. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    17.

              def destroy
          
      74. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    74. 
            

            

                begin
          
      75. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    75. 
            

            

                  response = UserCompanyService.remove_user(
          
      76. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    76. 
            

            

                    company_id: current_company_id,
          
      77. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    77.

      79. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    79.

      80. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    80. 
            

            

                  
          
      81. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    81. 
            

            

                  redirect_to company_users_path(current_company_id), 
          
      82.

                              notice: "User has been removed from #{current_company['name']}."
          
      83. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    83.

              def ensure_admin_or_owner
          
      98. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    98. 
            

            

                user_role = current_user_role_in_company

                unless %w[owner admin manager].include?(user_role)
          
      100.

              def current_user_role_in_company
          
      105. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    105. 
            

            

                return nil unless current_company_id && user_companies.present?
          
      106. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    106. 
            

            

                
          
      107. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    107. 
            

            

                company = user_companies.find { |c| (c['id'] || c[:id]) == current_company_id }
          
      108. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    108. 
            

            

                company ? (company['role'] || company[:role]) : nil
          
      109. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    109. 
            

            

              end
          
      110. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    110.

              def set_user
          
      112. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    112.

    113. 
            

            

                unless @user
          
      114. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    114.

    115.

      116. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    116.

      117.

              def fetch_company_users
          
      119. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    119. 
            

            

                UserCompanyService.list_users(
          
      120. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    120. 
            

            

                  company_id: current_company_id,
          
      121. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    121. 
            

            

                  token: current_token
          
      122. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    122. 
            

            

                )
          
      123. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    123. 
            

            

              rescue ApiService::ApiError => e
          
      124. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    124. 
            

            

                Rails.logger.error "Failed to fetch company users: #{e.message}"
          
      125. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    125. 
            

            

                []
          
      126. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    126.

      127.

              def available_roles_for_current_user
          
      129. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    129. 
            

            

                user_role = current_user_role_in_company
          
      130. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    130. 
            

            

                
          
      131. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    131. 
            

            

                case user_role
          
      132. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    132. 
            

            

                when 'owner'
          
      133. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    133. 
            

            

                  %w[owner admin manager accountant reviewer submitter viewer]
          
      134. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    134. 
            

            

                when 'admin'
          
      135. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    135. 
            

            

                  %w[manager accountant reviewer submitter viewer]
          
      136. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    136. 
            

            

                when 'manager'
          
      137. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    137. 
            

            

                  %w[accountant reviewer submitter viewer]
          
      138. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    138. 
            

            

                else
          
      139. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    139. 
            

            

                  []
          
      140. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    140. 
            

            

                end
          
      141. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    141. 
            

            

              end
          
      142. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    142. 
            

            

            end

            class WorkflowStatesController < ApplicationController

    2. 
            

            

              before_action :set_workflow_definition

              before_action :set_workflow_state, only: [:show, :edit, :update, :destroy]
          
      4. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    4. 
            

            

            
          
      5.

              def index
          
      6. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    6. 
            

            

                workflow_id = @workflow_definition[:id] || @workflow_definition['id']
          
      7. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    7. 
            

            

                result = WorkflowService.definition_states(workflow_id, token: current_user_token)

    8. 
            

            

            
          
      9. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    9. 
            

            

                # Handle different response formats from API

    10. 
            

            

                if result.is_a?(Hash)
          
      11. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    11. 
            

            

                  @workflow_states = result['data'] || result[:data] || result['workflow_states'] || result[:workflow_states] || []
          
      12. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    12. 
            

            

                elsif result.is_a?(Array)
          
      13. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    13. 
            

            

                  @workflow_states = result
          
      14. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    14.

                  @workflow_states = []

              rescue ApiService::ApiError => e

      21.

                @workflow_states = []

    22. 
            

            

              end
          
      23. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    23.

              def show

              def create

    41. 
            

            

                  workflow_id,
          
      42. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    42. 
            

            

                  workflow_state_params,

      44. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    44.

    45. 
            

            

            
          
      46.

                flash[:success] = 'Workflow state created successfully'
          
      47.

      49.

      53. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    53. 
            

            

              rescue ApiService::ApiError => e
          
      54. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    54. 
            

            

                @workflow_state = WorkflowStateForm.new(workflow_state_params)

      56.

      57.

      59.
