              def edit
          
      61. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    61. 
            

            

                # Convert API hash response to form model for the form
          
      62. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    62. 
            

            

                api_state = @workflow_state
          
      63. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    63. 
            

            

                @original_state = api_state  # Keep original for breadcrumbs and URLs
          
      64. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    64. 
            

            

                @workflow_state = WorkflowStateForm.from_hash(api_state)
          
      65. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    65. 
            

            

                @page_title = "Edit #{api_state['display_name']} State"
          
      66. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    66. 
            

            

              rescue ApiService::ApiError => e
          
      67. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    67. 
            

            

                flash[:error] = "Workflow state not found: #{e.message}"
          
      68. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    68. 
            

            

                workflow_id = @workflow_definition[:id] || @workflow_definition['id']
          
      69. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    69. 
            

            

                redirect_to workflow_definition_workflow_states_path(workflow_id)
          
      70. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    70. 
            

            

              end
          
      71. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    71.

              def update
          
      73. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    73. 
            

            

                workflow_id = @workflow_definition[:id] || @workflow_definition['id']
          
      74. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    74. 
            

            

                original_state = @workflow_state
          
      75. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    75. 
            

            

                updated_state = WorkflowService.update_state(
          
      76. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    76. 
            

            

                  workflow_id,
          
      77. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    77. 
            

            

                  original_state['id'],
          
      78. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    78. 
            

            

                  workflow_state_params,
          
      79. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    79. 
            

            

                  token: current_user_token
          
      80. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    80. 
            

            

                )
          
      81. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    81. 
            

            

            
          
      82. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    82. 
            

            

                flash[:success] = 'Workflow state updated successfully'
          
      83. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    83. 
            

            

                state_id = updated_state[:id] || updated_state['id']
          
      84. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    84. 
            

            

                if state_id
          
      85. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    85. 
            

            

                  redirect_to workflow_definition_workflow_state_path(workflow_id, state_id)
          
      86. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    86. 
            

            

                else
          
      87. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    87. 
            

            

                  redirect_to workflow_definition_workflow_states_path(workflow_id)
          
      88. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    88. 
            

            

                end
          
      89. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    89. 
            

            

              rescue ApiService::ApiError => e
          
      90. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    90. 
            

            

                @original_state = original_state  # Preserve original state for URLs and breadcrumbs
          
      91. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    91. 
            

            

                @workflow_state = WorkflowStateForm.new(workflow_state_params)
          
      92. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    92. 
            

            

                flash.now[:error] = "Failed to update workflow state: #{e.message}"
          
      93. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    93. 
            

            

                display_name = (original_state && (original_state['display_name'] || original_state[:display_name])) || 'State'
          
      94. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    94. 
            

            

                @page_title = "Edit #{display_name}"
          
      95. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    95. 
            

            

                render :edit, status: :unprocessable_content
          
      96. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    96. 
            

            

              end
          
      97. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    97.

              def destroy
          
      99. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    99. 
            

            

                workflow_id = @workflow_definition[:id] || @workflow_definition['id']
          
      100. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    100. 
            

            

                state_id = @workflow_state[:id] || @workflow_state['id']
          
      101. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    101. 
            

            

                WorkflowService.delete_state(workflow_id, state_id, token: current_user_token)
          
      102. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    102. 
            

            

            
          
      103. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    103. 
            

            

                flash[:success] = 'Workflow state deleted successfully'
          
      104. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    104.

      105. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    105. 
            

            

              rescue ApiService::ApiError => e
          
      106. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    106.

      107.

      108. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    108. 
            

            

              end

              def set_workflow_definition

    113.

    114. 
            

            

              rescue ApiService::ApiError => e
          
      115.

    117.

      118.

              def set_workflow_state

    121. 
            

            

                @workflow_state = WorkflowService.state(
          
      122. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    122. 
            

            

                  workflow_id,
          
      123. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    123. 
            

            

                  params[:id],
          
      124. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    124. 
            

            

                  token: current_user_token
          
      125. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    125. 
            

            

                )
          
      126. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    126. 
            

            

              rescue ApiService::ApiError => e
          
      127. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    127.

      128. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    128. 
            

            

                workflow_id = @workflow_definition[:id] || @workflow_definition['id']
          
      129.

              def workflow_state_params
          
      133. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    133. 
            

            

                # Handle both nested (:workflow_state) and flat parameter formats
          
      134. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    134. 
            

            

                if params[:workflow_state].present?
          
      135. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    135. 
            

            

                  params.require(:workflow_state).permit(
          
      136. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    136. 
            

            

                    :name, :code, :category, :color, :position, :is_initial, :is_final, :display_name
          
      137. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    137. 
            

            

                  )
          
      138. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    138. 
            

            

                else
          
      139. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    139. 
            

            

                  # Handle flat parameters (current form submission format)
          
      140. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    140. 
            

            

                  params.permit(
          
      141. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    141. 
            

            

                    :name, :code, :category, :color, :position, :is_initial, :is_final, :display_name
          
      142. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    142. 
            

            

                  )
          
      143. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    143. 
            

            

                end
          
      144. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    144. 
            

            

              end
          
      145. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    145. 
            

            

            end

            class WorkflowTransitionsController < ApplicationController

              before_action :set_workflow_definition
          
      3. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    3. 
            

            

              before_action :set_workflow_transition, only: [:show, :edit, :update, :destroy]
          
      4. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    4. 
            

            

            
          
      5.

              def index
          
      6. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    6. 
            

            

                workflow_id = @workflow_definition[:id] || @workflow_definition['id']
          
      7. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    7. 
            

            

                transitions_result = WorkflowService.definition_transitions(workflow_id, token: current_user_token)
          
      8. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    8. 
            

            

                states_result = WorkflowService.definition_states(workflow_id, token: current_user_token)
          
      9. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    9. 
            

            

            
          
      10. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    10. 
            

            

                # Handle different response formats from API for transitions
          
      11. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    11. 
            

            

                if transitions_result.is_a?(Hash)
          
      12. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    12. 
            

            

                  @workflow_transitions = transitions_result['data'] || transitions_result[:data] || transitions_result['workflow_transitions'] || transitions_result[:workflow_transitions] || []
          
      13. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    13. 
            

            

                elsif transitions_result.is_a?(Array)
          
      14. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    14. 
            

            

                  @workflow_transitions = transitions_result
          
      15. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    15. 
            

            

                else
          
      16. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    16. 
            

            

                  @workflow_transitions = []
          
      17. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    17. 
            

            

                end
          
      18. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    18. 
            

            

            
          
      19. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    19. 
            

            

                # Handle different response formats from API for states
          
      20. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    20. 
            

            

                if states_result.is_a?(Hash)

    21.

    22.

      27. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    27. 
            

            

            
          
      28.

              rescue ApiService::ApiError => e

              def show

    36. 
            

            

                workflow_id = @workflow_definition[:id] || @workflow_definition['id']

    37. 
            

            

                result = WorkflowService.definition_states(workflow_id, token: current_user_token)

    38.

                # Handle different response formats from API

                  @workflow_states = []

    46.

      47. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    47. 
            

            

            
          
      48. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    48. 
            

            

                @from_state = @workflow_states.find { |state| (state[:code] || state['code']) == (@workflow_transition[:from_state_code] || @workflow_transition['from_state_code']) }
          
      49. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    49. 
            

            

                @to_state = @workflow_states.find { |state| (state[:code] || state['code']) == (@workflow_transition[:to_state_code] || @workflow_transition['to_state_code']) }
          
      50.

                @page_title = "#{@workflow_transition[:display_name] || @workflow_transition['display_name']} Transition"
          
      51. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    51. 
            

            

              end
          
      52.

      53.

      65.

                @workflow_transition = {
          
      67.

                  'name' => '',

      72. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    72. 
            

            

                  'required_roles' => [],
          
      73. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    73. 
            

            

                  'requires_comment' => false,
          
      74. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    74. 
            

            

                  'guard_conditions' => []
          
      75. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    75. 
            

            

                }
          
      76. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    76. 
            

            

                @page_title = "New Workflow Transition"
          
      77. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    77. 
            

            

              rescue ApiService::ApiError => e
          
      78.

      79.

              def create
          
      84. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    84. 
            

            

                workflow_id = @workflow_definition[:id] || @workflow_definition['id']
          
      85. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    85. 
            

            

                @workflow_transition = WorkflowService.create_transition(
          
      86. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    86. 
            

            

                  workflow_id,
          
      87. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    87. 
            

            

                  workflow_transition_params,

      89.

      90. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    90. 
            

            

            
          
      91.

              rescue ApiService::ApiError => e
          
      95.

                workflow_id = @workflow_definition[:id] || @workflow_definition['id']
          
      96. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    96. 
            

            

                @workflow_states = WorkflowService.definition_states(workflow_id, token: current_user_token)
          
      97. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    97. 
            

            

                @workflow_transition = workflow_transition_params.merge({
          
      98. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    98. 
            

            

                  'name' => workflow_transition_params[:name] || '',
          
      99.

                  'code' => workflow_transition_params[:code] || '',
          
      100.

      101. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    101. 
            

            

                  'from_state_id' => workflow_transition_params[:from_state_id] || '',
          
      102. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    102. 
            

            

                  'to_state_id' => workflow_transition_params[:to_state_id] || '',
          
      103. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    103. 
            

            

                  'required_roles' => workflow_transition_params[:required_roles] || [],
          
      104.

                  'requires_comment' => workflow_transition_params[:requires_comment] || false,
          
      105. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    105. 
            

            

                  'guard_conditions' => workflow_transition_params[:guard_conditions] || []
          
      106. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    106. 
            

            

                })
          
      107. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    107. 
            

            

                flash.now[:error] = "Failed to create workflow transition: #{e.message}"
          
      108.

                @page_title = "New Workflow Transition"
          
      109. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    109.

      110.

      111.

              def edit
          
      113. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    113. 
            

            

                workflow_id = @workflow_definition[:id] || @workflow_definition['id']
          
      114. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    114. 
            

            

                result = WorkflowService.definition_states(workflow_id, token: current_user_token)

    115. 
            

            

            
          
      116. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    116. 
            

            

                # Handle different response formats from API
          
      117.

                if result.is_a?(Hash)
          
      118. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    118.

                  @workflow_states = []

    123.

      124. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    124. 
            

            

            
          
      125.

                @page_title = "Edit #{@workflow_transition[:display_name] || @workflow_transition['display_name']} Transition"
          
      126. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    126. 
            

            

              rescue ApiService::ApiError => e
          
      127.

                flash[:error] = "Workflow transition not found: #{e.message}"
          
      128.

                workflow_id = @workflow_definition[:id] || @workflow_definition['id']

              def destroy
          
      163. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    163. 
            

            

                workflow_id = @workflow_definition[:id] || @workflow_definition['id']
          
      164. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    164. 
            

            

                WorkflowService.delete_transition(
          
      165. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    165. 
            

            

                  workflow_id,
          
      166. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    166. 
            

            

                  @workflow_transition[:id] || @workflow_transition['id'],
          
      167. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    167. 
            

            

                  token: current_user_token
          
      168. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    168. 
            

            

                )
          
      169. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    169. 
            

            

            
          
      170. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    170. 
            

            

                flash[:success] = 'Workflow transition deleted successfully'
          
      171. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    171. 
            

            

                workflow_id = @workflow_definition[:id] || @workflow_definition['id']
          
      172.

                redirect_to workflow_definition_workflow_transitions_path(workflow_id)
          
      173. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    173. 
            

            

              rescue ApiService::ApiError => e
          
      174. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    174. 
            

            

                flash[:error] = "Failed to delete workflow transition: #{e.message}"
          
      175. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    175. 
            

            

                workflow_id = @workflow_definition[:id] || @workflow_definition['id']
          
      176.

      177. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    177.

              def set_workflow_definition
          
      182. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    182. 
            

            

                @workflow_definition = WorkflowService.definition(params[:workflow_definition_id], token: current_user_token)
          
      183. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    183. 
            

            

              rescue ApiService::ApiError => e
          
      184. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    184. 
            

            

                flash[:error] = "Workflow definition not found: #{e.message}"
          
      185. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    185. 
            

            

                redirect_to workflow_definitions_path
          
      186. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    186. 
            

            

              end
          
      187. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    187. 
            

            

            
          
      188. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    188. 
            

            

              def set_workflow_transition
          
      189. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    189. 
            

            

                workflow_id = @workflow_definition[:id] || @workflow_definition['id']
          
      190. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    190. 
            

            

                @workflow_transition = WorkflowService.get_transition(
          
      191. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    191. 
            

            

                  workflow_id,
          
      192. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    192. 
            

            

                  params[:id],
          
      193. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    193. 
            

            

                  token: current_user_token
          
      194. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    194. 
            

            

                )
          
      195. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    195. 
            

            

              rescue ApiService::ApiError => e
          
      196. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    196. 
            

            

                flash[:error] = "Workflow transition not found: #{e.message}"
          
      197. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    197. 
            

            

                workflow_id = @workflow_definition[:id] || @workflow_definition['id']
          
      198. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    198. 
            

            

                redirect_to workflow_definition_workflow_transitions_path(workflow_id)
          
      199. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    199. 
            

            

              end
          
      200. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    200. 
            

            

            
          
      201. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    201. 
            

            

              def workflow_transition_params
          
      202. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    202. 
            

            

                # Handle both nested (:workflow_transition) and flat parameter formats
          
      203. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    203. 
            

            

                if params[:workflow_transition].present? && params[:workflow_transition].is_a?(Hash) &&
          
      204. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    204. 
            

            

                   params[:workflow_transition].key?(:display_name) || params[:workflow_transition].key?('display_name')
          
      205. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    205. 
            

            

                  # Standard scoped parameters
          
      206. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    206. 
            

            

                  permitted = params.require(:workflow_transition).permit(
          
      207. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    207. 
            

            

                    :name, :code, :display_name, :from_state_id, :to_state_id, :requires_comment,
          
      208. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    208. 
            

            

                    required_roles: [], guard_conditions: []
          
      209. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    209. 
            

            

                  )
          
      210. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    210. 
            

            

                else
          
      211. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    211. 
            

            

                  # Handle flat parameters (mixed with some scoped)
          
      212. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    212. 
            

            

                  permitted = {
          
      213. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    213. 
            

            

                    display_name: params[:display_name],
          
      214. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    214. 
            

            

                    name: params[:name],
          
      215. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    215. 
            

            

                    code: params[:code],
          
      216. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    216. 
            

            

                    from_state_id: params[:from_state_id],
          
      217. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    217. 
            

            

                    to_state_id: params[:to_state_id],
          
      218. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    218. 
            

            

                    requires_comment: params[:requires_comment],
          
      219. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    219. 
            

            

                    required_roles: params[:required_roles] || [],
          
      220. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    220. 
            

            

                    guard_conditions: (params[:workflow_transition]&.dig(:guard_conditions) ||
          
      221. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    221. 
            

            

                                       params[:workflow_transition]&.dig('guard_conditions') || [])
          
      222. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    222. 
            

            

                  }
          
      223. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    223. 
            

            

                end
          
      224. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    224. 
            

            

            
          
      225. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    225. 
            

            

                # Convert empty strings to nil for state IDs
          
      226. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    226. 
            

            

                permitted[:from_state_id] = nil if permitted[:from_state_id].blank?
          
      227. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    227. 
            

            

                permitted[:to_state_id] = nil if permitted[:to_state_id].blank?
          
      228. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    228. 
            

            

            
          
      229. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    229. 
            

            

                # Ensure required_roles is an array and filter empty strings
          
      230. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    230. 
            

            

                permitted[:required_roles] = Array(permitted[:required_roles]).reject(&:blank?)
          
      231. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    231. 
            

            

            
          
      232. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    232. 
            

            

                # Ensure guard_conditions is an array and filter empty strings
          
      233. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    233. 
            

            

                permitted[:guard_conditions] = Array(permitted[:guard_conditions]).reject(&:blank?)
          
      234. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    234. 
            

            

            
          
      235. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    235. 
            

            

                permitted
          
      236. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    236. 
            

            

              end
          
      237. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    237. 
            

            

            end
          
      238.

    app/controllers/workflows_controller.rb

    0.0% lines covered

    160 relevant lines. 0 lines covered and 160 lines missed. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    1. 
            

            

            class WorkflowsController < ApplicationController
          
      2. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    2. 
            

            

              before_action :authenticate_user!
          
      3. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    3. 
            

            

              before_action :load_invoice, except: [:bulk_transition]
          
      4. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    4. 
            

            

              before_action :load_history, only: [:show]
          
      5. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    5. 
            

            

              
          
      6. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    6. 
            

            

              def show
          
      7. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    7. 
            

            

                begin
          
      8. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    8. 
            

            

                  response = WorkflowService.available_transitions(
          
      9. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    9. 
            

            

                    @invoice[:id],
          
      10. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    10. 
            

            

                    token: current_user_token
          
      11. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    11. 
            

            

                  )
          
      12. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    12. 
            

            

            
          
      13. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    13. 
            

            

                  # Transform the API response into the format expected by the view
          
      14. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    14. 
            

            

                  if response && response[:available_transitions]
          
      15. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    15. 
            

            

                    @available_transitions = response[:available_transitions].map do |transition_data|
          
      16. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    16. 
            

            

                      {
          
      17. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    17. 
            

            

                        to_status: transition_data.dig(:to_state, :code) || transition_data.dig('to_state', 'code'),
          
      18. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    18. 
            

            

                        to_status_name: transition_data.dig(:to_state, :name) || transition_data.dig('to_state', 'name'),
          
      19. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    19. 
            

            

                        description: transition_data.dig(:transition, :description) || transition_data.dig('transition', 'description'),
          
      20. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    20. 
            

            

                        requires_comment: transition_data.dig(:transition, :requires_comment) || transition_data.dig('transition', 'requires_comment') || false
          
      21. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    21. 
            

            

                      }
          
      22. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    22. 
            

            

                    end
          
      23. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    23. 
            

            

                  elsif response.is_a?(Array)
          
      24. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    24. 
            

            

                    @available_transitions = response
          
      25. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    25. 
            

            

                  else
          
      26. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    26. 
            

            

                    @available_transitions = []
          
      27. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    27. 
            

            

                  end
          
      28. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    28. 
            

            

                rescue ApiService::ApiError => e
          
      29. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    29. 
            

            

                  @available_transitions = []
          
      30. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    30. 
            

            

                  flash[:alert] = "Failed to load workflow transitions: #{e.message}"
          
      31. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    31. 
            

            

                  redirect_to invoice_path(@invoice[:id]) and return
          
      32. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    32. 
            

            

                end
          
      33. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    33. 
            

            

            
          
      34. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    34. 
            

            

                respond_to do |format|
          
      35. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    35. 
            

            

                  format.html
          
      36. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    36. 
            

            

                  format.turbo_stream
          
      37. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    37. 
            

            

                end
          
      38. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    38. 
            

            

              end
          
      39.

      40.

              def transition
          
      41. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    41. 
            

            

                result = WorkflowService.transition(
          
      42. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    42. 
            

            

                  @invoice[:id],
          
      43.

      46. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    46. 
            

            

                )
          
      47. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    47. 
            

            

                
          
      48. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    48. 
            

            

                respond_to do |format|

    49. 
            

            

                  format.html do

                                notice: "Invoice status updated to #{params[:status]}"
          
      52. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    52. 
            

            

                  end
          
      53. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    53. 
            

            

                  format.turbo_stream do
          
      54. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    54. 
            

            

                    @invoice = InvoiceService.find(@invoice[:id], token: current_user_token)
          
      55. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    55. 
            

            

                    @history = WorkflowService.history(token: current_user_token, params: { invoice_id: @invoice[:id] })
          
      56. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    56. 
            

            

            
          
      57. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    57. 
            

            

                    # Get available transitions and transform them
          
      58. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    58. 
            

            

                    response = WorkflowService.available_transitions(
          
      59. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    59. 
            

            

                      @invoice[:id],
          
      60. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    60. 
            

            

                      token: current_user_token
          
      61. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    61. 
            

            

                    )
          
      62. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    62. 
            

            

            
          
      63. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    63. 
            

            

                    # Transform the API response into the format expected by the view
          
      64. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    64. 
            

            

                    if response && response[:available_transitions]
          
      65. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    65. 
            

            

                      @available_transitions = response[:available_transitions].map do |transition_data|
          
      66. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    66. 
            

            

                        {
          
      67. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    67. 
            

            

                          to_status: transition_data.dig(:to_state, :code) || transition_data.dig('to_state', 'code'),
          
      68. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    68. 
            

            

                          to_status_name: transition_data.dig(:to_state, :name) || transition_data.dig('to_state', 'name'),
          
      69. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    69. 
            

            

                          description: transition_data.dig(:transition, :description) || transition_data.dig('transition', 'description'),
          
      70. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    70. 
            

            

                          requires_comment: transition_data.dig(:transition, :requires_comment) || transition_data.dig('transition', 'requires_comment') || false
          
      71. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    71. 
            

            

                        }
          
      72. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    72. 
            

            

                      end
          
      73. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    73. 
            

            

                    elsif response.is_a?(Array)
          
      74. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    74. 
            

            

                      @available_transitions = response
          
      75. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    75. 
            

            

                    else
          
      76. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    76. 
            

            

                      @available_transitions = []
          
      77. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    77. 
            

            

                    end
          
      78. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    78. 
            

            

                  end
          
      79.

                end
          
      80.

              rescue ApiService::ValidationError => e

    81.

      82.

      83. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    83.

      84.

                                alert: e.errors.join(', ')
          
      85.

    86. 
            

            

                  format.turbo_stream do

              def bulk_transition
          
      110. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    110. 
            

            

                unless params[:invoice_ids].present? && params[:status].present?
          
      111. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    111. 
            

            

                  redirect_to invoices_path, alert: "Please select invoices and specify a status"
          
      112. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    112. 
            

            

                  return
          
      113. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    113. 
            

            

                end
          
      114. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    114. 
            

            

            
          
      115. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    115. 
            

            

                invoice_ids = params[:invoice_ids].reject(&:blank?).map(&:to_i)
          
      116. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    116. 
            

            

            
          
      117. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    117. 
            

            

                if invoice_ids.empty?
          
      118. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    118. 
            

            

                  redirect_to invoices_path, alert: "Please select at least one invoice"
          
      119. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    119. 
            

            

                  return
          
      120. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    120. 
            

            

                end
          
      121. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    121. 
            

            

            
          
      122. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    122. 
            

            

                begin
          
      123. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    123. 
            

            

                  result = WorkflowService.bulk_transition(
          
      124. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    124. 
            

            

                    invoice_ids,
          
      125. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    125. 
            

            

                    status: params[:status],
          
      126. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    126. 
            

            

                    comment: params[:comment],
          
      127. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    127. 
            

            

                    token: current_user_token
          
      128. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    128. 
            

            

                  )
          
      129. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    129. 
            

            

            
          
      130. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    130. 
            

            

                  success_count = result['success_count'] || invoice_ids.size
          
      131. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    131. 
            

            

                  flash[:success] = "Successfully updated #{success_count} invoice(s) to #{params[:status]}"
          
      132. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    132. 
            

            

            
          
      133. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    133. 
            

            

                  if result['errors'] && result['errors'].any?
          
      134. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    134. 
            

            

                    flash[:warning] = "Some invoices could not be updated: #{result['errors'].join(', ')}"
          
      135. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    135. 
            

            

                  end
          
      136. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    136. 
            

            

            
          
      137. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    137. 
            

            

                rescue ApiService::ValidationError => e
          
      138. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    138. 
            

            

                  error_message = case e.errors
          
      139. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    139. 
            

            

                                  when Array
          
      140. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    140. 
            

            

                                    e.errors.join(', ')
          
      141. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    141. 
            

            

                                  when Hash
          
      142. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    142. 
            

            

                                    e.errors.values.flatten.join(', ')
          
      143. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    143. 
            

            

                                  else
          
      144. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    144. 
            

            

                                    e.message
          
      145. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    145. 
            

            

                                  end
          
      146. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    146. 
            

            

                  flash[:error] = "Validation error: #{error_message}"
          
      147. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    147. 
            

            

                rescue ApiService::ApiError => e
          
      148. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    148. 
            

            

                  flash[:error] = "Failed to update invoices: #{e.message}"
          
      149. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    149. 
            

            

                end
          
      150. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    150. 
            

            

            
          
      151. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    151. 
            

            

                redirect_to invoices_path
          
      152. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    152. 
            

            

              end
          
      153. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    153. 
            

            

              
          
      154. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    154. 
            

            

              private
          
      155. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    155. 
            

            

              
          
      156. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    156. 
            

            

              def load_invoice
          
      157. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    157. 
            

            

                @invoice = InvoiceService.find(params[:invoice_id], token: current_user_token)
          
      158. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    158. 
            

            

              rescue ApiService::ApiError => e
          
      159. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    159. 
            

            

                if e.message.include?("not found") || e.message.include?("Not found")
          
      160. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    160. 
            

            

                  redirect_to invoices_path, alert: "Invoice not found"
          
      161. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    161. 
            

            

                else
          
      162. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    162. 
            

            

                  redirect_to invoices_path, alert: "Failed to load invoice: #{e.message}"
          
      163. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    163. 
            

            

                end
          
      164. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    164. 
            

            

              end
          
      165. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    165. 
            

            

              
          
      166. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    166. 
            

            

              def load_history
          
      167. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    167. 
            

            

                response = WorkflowService.history(token: current_user_token, params: { invoice_id: @invoice[:id] })
          
      168. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    168. 
            

            

            
          
      169. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    169. 
            

            

                # Handle different response formats
          
      170. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    170. 
            

            

                if response.is_a?(Array)
          
      171. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    171. 
            

            

                  @history = response
          
      172. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    172. 
            

            

                elsif response && response[:data]
          
      173. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    173. 
            

            

                  @history = response[:data]
          
      174. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    174. 
            

            

                elsif response && response[:history]
          
      175. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    175. 
            

            

                  @history = response[:history]
          
      176. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    176. 
            

            

                else
          
      177. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    177. 
            

            

                  @history = []
          
      178. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    178. 
            

            

                end
          
      179. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    179. 
            

            

              rescue ApiService::ApiError => e
          
      180. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    180. 
            

            

                @history = []
          
      181. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    181. 
            

            

                Rails.logger.error "Failed to load workflow history: #{e.message}"
          
      182. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    182. 
            

            

              end
          
      183. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    183. 
            

            

            end
          
      184.

    app/helpers/application_helper.rb

    0.0% lines covered

    147 relevant lines. 0 lines covered and 147 lines missed.

            module ApplicationHelper
          
      2.

              def number_with_delimiter(number, delimiter: ',')
          
      3. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    3. 
            

            

                return '' if number.nil?
          
      4. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    4. 
            

            

                parts = number.to_s.split('.')
          
      5. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    5. 
            

            

                parts[0].gsub!(/(\d)(?=(\d\d\d)+(?!\d))/, "\\1#{delimiter}")
          
      6. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    6. 
            

            

                parts.join('.')
          
      7. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    7. 
            

            

              end
          
      8. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    8. 
            

            

              
          
      9. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    9. 
            

            

              def format_currency(amount, currency = '')
          
      10. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    10. 
            

            

                return '-' if amount.nil?
          
      11. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    11. 
            

            

                "#{number_with_delimiter(sprintf('%.2f', amount))} #{currency}"
          
      12. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    12. 
            

            

              end
          
      13. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    13. 
            

            

              
          
      14. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    14. 
            

            

              def format_percentage(percentage)
          
      15. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    15. 
            

            

                return '-' if percentage.nil?
          
      16. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    16. 
            

            

                "#{sprintf('%.2f', percentage)}%"
          
      17. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    17. 
            

            

              end
          
      18. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    18. 
            

            

              
          
      19. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    19. 
            

            

              def format_date(date)
          
      20. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    20. 
            

            

                return '-' if date.nil?
          
      21. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    21. 
            

            

                Date.parse(date.to_s).strftime('%B %d, %Y')
          
      22. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    22. 
            

            

              rescue
          
      23. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    23. 
            

            

                date.to_s
          
      24. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    24. 
            

            

              end
          
      25. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    25. 
            

            

              
          
      26. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    26. 
            

            

              def format_date_short(date)
          
      27. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    27. 
            

            

                return '-' if date.nil?
          
      28. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    28. 
            

            

                Date.parse(date.to_s).strftime('%b %d, %Y')
          
      29. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    29. 
            

            

              rescue
          
      30. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    30.

    31. 
            

            

              end
          
      32. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    32. 
            

            

              
          
      33. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    33. 
            

            

              def status_badge_class(status)
          
      34. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    34. 
            

            

                base_classes = "inline-flex items-center px-2.5 py-0.5 rounded-full text-xs font-medium"
          
      35. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    35. 
            

            

                
          
      36. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    36. 
            

            

                case status.to_s.downcase
          
      37. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    37. 
            

            

                when 'draft'
          
      38. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    38. 
            

            

                  "#{base_classes} bg-gray-100 text-gray-800"
          
      39. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    39. 
            

            

                when 'sent'
          
      40. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    40. 
            

            

                  "#{base_classes} bg-blue-100 text-blue-800"
          
      41. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    41. 
            

            

                when 'viewed'
          
      42. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    42. 
            

            

                  "#{base_classes} bg-purple-100 text-purple-800"
          
      43. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    43. 
            

            

                when 'partial'
          
      44. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    44. 
            

            

                  "#{base_classes} bg-yellow-100 text-yellow-800"
          
      45. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    45. 
            

            

                when 'paid'
          
      46. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    46. 
            

            

                  "#{base_classes} bg-green-100 text-green-800"
          
      47. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    47. 
            

            

                when 'overdue'
          
      48. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    48. 
            

            

                  "#{base_classes} bg-red-100 text-red-800"
          
      49. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    49. 
            

            

                when 'cancelled'
          
      50. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    50. 
            

            

                  "#{base_classes} bg-gray-100 text-gray-800"
          
      51. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    51. 
            

            

                when 'frozen'
          
      52. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    52. 
            

            

                  "#{base_classes} bg-indigo-100 text-indigo-800"
          
      53. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    53. 
            

            

                else
          
      54. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    54. 
            

            

                  "#{base_classes} bg-gray-100 text-gray-800"
          
      55. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    55. 
            

            

                end
          
      56. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    56. 
            

            

              end
          
      57. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    57. 
            

            

              
          
      58. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    58. 
            

            

              def breadcrumb(*items)
          
      59. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    59. 
            

            

                content_for :breadcrumb do
          
      60. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    60. 
            

            

                  content_tag :nav, class: "flex mb-6", "aria-label": "Breadcrumb" do
          
      61. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    61. 
            

            

                    content_tag :ol, class: "inline-flex items-center space-x-1 md:space-x-3" do
          
      62. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    62. 
            

            

                      items.map.with_index do |item, index|
          
      63. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    63. 
            

            

                        if index == items.length - 1
          
      64. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    64. 
            

            

                          # Last item (current page)
          
      65. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    65. 
            

            

                          content_tag :li, class: "inline-flex items-center" do
          
      66. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    66. 
            

            

                            content_tag :span, item.is_a?(Array) ? item.first : item, 
          
      67. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    67. 
            

            

                              class: "text-sm font-medium text-gray-700"
          
      68. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    68. 
            

            

                          end
          
      69. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    69. 
            

            

                        else
          
      70. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    70. 
            

            

                          # Linkable items
          
      71. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    71. 
            

            

                          content_tag :li, class: "inline-flex items-center" do
          
      72. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    72. 
            

            

                            if item.is_a?(Array)
          
      73. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    73. 
            

            

                              link = link_to item.first, item.last, 
          
      74. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    74. 
            

            

                                class: "inline-flex items-center text-sm font-medium text-gray-700 hover:text-indigo-600"
          
      75. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    75. 
            

            

                              if index > 0
          
      76. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    76.

      77. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    77.

      78. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    78.

              def flash_class(type)
          
      106. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    106. 
            

            

                case type.to_s
          
      107. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    107. 
            

            

                when 'notice', 'success'
          
      108. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    108. 
            

            

                  'bg-green-50 text-green-800 border-green-200'
          
      109. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    109. 
            

            

                when 'alert', 'error'
          
      110. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    110. 
            

            

                  'bg-red-50 text-red-800 border-red-200'
          
      111. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    111. 
            

            

                when 'warning'
          
      112. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    112. 
            

            

                  'bg-yellow-50 text-yellow-800 border-yellow-200'
          
      113. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    113. 
            

            

                else
          
      114. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    114. 
            

            

                  'bg-blue-50 text-blue-800 border-blue-200'
          
      115. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    115. 
            

            

                end
          
      116. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    116. 
            

            

              end
          
      117. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    117. 
            

            

              
          
      118. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    118. 
            

            

              def flash_icon(type)
          
      119. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    119. 
            

            

                case type.to_s
          
      120.

              # Helper to add error styling to form fields
          
      140. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    140. 
            

            

              def field_class(field_name, base_classes, errors = nil)
          
      141. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    141. 
            

            

                classes = base_classes
          
      142. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    142. 
            

            

            
          
      143. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    143. 
            

            

                if errors && errors[field_name.to_s]
          
      144. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    144. 
            

            

                  # Add error styling: red border and red focus ring
          
      145. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    145. 
            

            

                  classes = classes.gsub('border-gray-300', 'border-red-300')
          
      146. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    146. 
            

            

                  classes = classes.gsub('focus:border-indigo-500', 'focus:border-red-500')
          
      147. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    147. 
            

            

                  classes = classes.gsub('focus:ring-indigo-500', 'focus:ring-red-500')
          
      148. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    148. 
            

            

                else
          
      149. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    149. 
            

            

                  # Ensure default styling
          
      150. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    150. 
            

            

                  unless classes.include?('border-')
          
      151. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    151. 
            

            

                    classes += ' border-gray-300'
          
      152. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    152. 
            

            

                  end
          
      153. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    153. 
            

            

                  unless classes.include?('focus:border-')
          
      154. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    154. 
            

            

                    classes += ' focus:border-indigo-500'
          
      155. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    155. 
            

            

                  end
          
      156. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    156. 
            

            

                end
          
      157. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    157. 
            

            

            
          
      158. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    158. 
            

            

                classes
          
      159. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    159. 
            

            

              end
          
      160. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    160. 
            

            

            
          
      161. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    161. 
            

            

              # Helper to access hash values with both symbol and string keys
          
      162. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    162. 
            

            

              def safe_access(hash, key)
          
      163. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    163. 
            

            

                return nil unless hash.is_a?(Hash)
          
      164. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    164. 
            

            

                hash[key.to_sym] || hash[key.to_s]
          
      165. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    165. 
            

            

              end
          
      166. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    166. 
            

            

            end
          
      167.

              def paginate(collection, options = {})
          
      3. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    3. 
            

            

                render 'shared/pagination', {
          
      4. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    4.

    5.

              def page_entries_info(collection)
          
      11. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    11. 
            

            

                if collection.total_count.zero?
          
      12. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    12. 
            

            

                  "No entries found"
          
      13. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    13. 
            

            

                else
          
      14. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    14. 
            

            

                  from = (collection.current_page - 1) * collection.limit_value + 1
          
      15. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    15. 
            

            

                  to = [from + collection.size - 1, collection.total_count].min
          
      16. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    16. 
            

            

                  
          
      17. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    17. 
            

            

                  "Showing <b>#{from}</b> to <b>#{to}</b> of <b>#{collection.total_count}</b> entries".html_safe
          
      18. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    18. 
            

            

                end
          
      19. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    19. 
            

            

              end
          
      20. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    20. 
            

            

            end
          
      21.
