              def sla_status_class(invoice_workflow)
          
      3. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    3. 
            

            

                return '' unless invoice_workflow.present? && has_sla_deadline?(invoice_workflow)
          
      4. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    4. 
            

            

            
          
      5. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    5. 
            

            

                if sla_overdue?(invoice_workflow)
          
      6. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    6. 
            

            

                  'text-red-600 bg-red-100'
          
      7. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    7. 
            

            

                elsif sla_warning?(invoice_workflow)
          
      8. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    8. 
            

            

                  'text-yellow-600 bg-yellow-100'
          
      9. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    9.

    10.

              def sla_status_text(invoice_workflow)
          
      15. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    15.

    16. 
            

            

            
          
      17.

              def sla_icon(invoice_workflow)

              def time_in_current_state(invoice_workflow)
          
      42. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    42. 
            

            

                return 'Unknown' unless invoice_workflow&.dig('entered_current_state_at')
          
      43. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    43. 
            

            

            
          
      44. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    44. 
            

            

                entered_at = Time.parse(invoice_workflow['entered_current_state_at'])
          
      45. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    45. 
            

            

                duration = Time.current - entered_at
          
      46. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    46. 
            

            

            
          
      47. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    47. 
            

            

                format_duration(duration)
          
      48. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    48. 
            

            

              end
          
      49.

      50.

              def sla_progress_percentage(invoice_workflow)
          
      51. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    51. 
            

            

                return 0 unless invoice_workflow.present? && has_sla_deadline?(invoice_workflow)
          
      52. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    52. 
            

            

            
          
      53. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    53. 
            

            

                entered_at = Time.parse(invoice_workflow['entered_current_state_at'])
          
      54. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    54. 
            

            

                deadline = Time.parse(invoice_workflow['sla_deadline'])
          
      55. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    55. 
            

            

                now = Time.current
          
      56. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    56. 
            

            

            
          
      57. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    57. 
            

            

                total_duration = deadline - entered_at
          
      58. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    58. 
            

            

                elapsed_duration = now - entered_at
          
      59. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    59. 
            

            

            
          
      60. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    60. 
            

            

                return 100 if elapsed_duration >= total_duration
          
      61. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    61. 
            

            

            
          
      62. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    62. 
            

            

                percentage = (elapsed_duration / total_duration * 100).round
          
      63. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    63. 
            

            

                [0, [percentage, 100].min].max
          
      64. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    64. 
            

            

              end
          
      65. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    65. 
            

            

            
          
      66. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    66. 
            

            

              def sla_deadline_formatted(invoice_workflow)

      68.

              def sla_overdue?(invoice_workflow)

    76. 
            

            

                return false unless has_sla_deadline?(invoice_workflow)
          
      77. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    77. 
            

            

            
          
      78. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    78.

              def sla_warning?(invoice_workflow)

                return false unless has_sla_deadline?(invoice_workflow)

                deadline = Time.parse(invoice_workflow['sla_deadline'])

              def time_until_deadline(invoice_workflow)
          
      96. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    96. 
            

            

                return 'No deadline' unless has_sla_deadline?(invoice_workflow)
          
      97.

              def time_since_deadline(invoice_workflow)
          
      107. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    107. 
            

            

                return 'No deadline' unless has_sla_deadline?(invoice_workflow)

              def format_duration(duration_seconds)
          
      118. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    118. 
            

            

                return '0 minutes' if duration_seconds <= 0
          
      119. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    119. 
            

            

            
          
      120. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    120. 
            

            

                days = duration_seconds / 1.day
          
      121. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    121. 
            

            

                hours = (duration_seconds % 1.day) / 1.hour
          
      122. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    122. 
            

            

                minutes = (duration_seconds % 1.hour) / 1.minute
          
      123. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    123. 
            

            

            
          
      124. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    124. 
            

            

                parts = []
          
      125. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    125. 
            

            

                parts << "#{days.to_i} day#{'s' if days != 1}" if days >= 1
          
      126. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    126. 
            

            

                parts << "#{hours.to_i} hour#{'s' if hours != 1}" if hours >= 1
          
      127. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    127. 
            

            

                parts << "#{minutes.to_i} minute#{'s' if minutes != 1}" if minutes >= 1
          
      128. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    128. 
            

            

            
          
      129. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    129. 
            

            

                # If we have no parts, it's less than a minute
          
      130. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    130. 
            

            

                return 'Less than 1 minute' if parts.empty?
          
      131. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    131. 
            

            

            
          
      132. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    132. 
            

            

                # Join parts with commas, but only show first two for readability
          
      133. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    133. 
            

            

                parts.take(2).join(', ')
          
      134. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    134. 
            

            

              end
          
      135. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    135. 
            

            

            end
          
      136.

              def self.validate_params(params)

    28. 
            

            

                validator = new(params)

    29. 
            

            

                validator.valid? ? { valid: true } : { valid: false, errors: validator.errors.full_messages }

              def self.validate_zipcode(post_code, country_code)
          
      33. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    33. 
            

            

                return { valid: false, error: "Post code is required" } if post_code.blank?
          
      34. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    34. 
            

            

                return { valid: false, error: "Country code is required" } if country_code.blank?
          
      35. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    35. 
            

            

                
          
      36. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    36. 
            

            

                # Convert 3-letter country code to 2-letter if needed
          
      37. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    37. 
            

            

                country_code_2 = new.send(:convert_to_alpha2, country_code)
          
      38. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    38. 
            

            

                return { valid: false, error: "Invalid country code" } if country_code_2.nil?
          
      39. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    39. 
            

            

                
          
      40. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    40. 
            

            

                if ValidatesZipcode.valid?(post_code, country_code_2)
          
      41. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    41. 
            

            

                  { valid: true, formatted: ValidatesZipcode.format(post_code, country_code_2) }
          
      42. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    42. 
            

            

                else
          
      43. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    43. 
            

            

                  { valid: false, error: "Invalid postal code for #{country_code}" }
          
      44. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    44. 
            

            

                end
          
      45. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    45. 
            

            

              end
          
      46. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    46. 
            

            

            
          
      47. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    47. 
            

            

              private
          
      48. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    48. 
            

            

            
          
      49.

              def country_code_present?
          
      50. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    50. 
            

            

                country_code.present?
          
      51. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    51. 
            

            

              end
          
      52. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    52. 
            

            

            
          
      53. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    53. 
            

            

              def convert_to_alpha2(country_code)
          
      54. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    54. 
            

            

                # Map common 3-letter codes to 2-letter codes used by validates_zipcode
          
      55. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    55. 
            

            

                country_mapping = {
          
      56. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    56. 
            

            

                  'ESP' => 'ES',  # Spain
          
      57. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    57. 
            

            

                  'USA' => 'US',  # United States
          
      58. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    58. 
            

            

                  'GBR' => 'GB',  # United Kingdom
          
      59. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    59. 
            

            

                  'FRA' => 'FR',  # France
          
      60. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    60. 
            

            

                  'DEU' => 'DE',  # Germany
          
      61. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    61. 
            

            

                  'ITA' => 'IT',  # Italy
          
      62. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    62. 
            

            

                  'PRT' => 'PT',  # Portugal
          
      63. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    63. 
            

            

                  'NLD' => 'NL',  # Netherlands
          
      64. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    64. 
            

            

                  'BEL' => 'BE',  # Belgium

                def authenticated_request(method, endpoint, token: nil, body: nil, query: nil)
          
      43. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    43. 
            
              187
            

            

                  options = build_request_options(token: token, body: body, query: query)

    44. 
            
              187

      46.

      52.

      53.

                  # Re-raise our own exceptions without wrapping

                def build_request_options(token: nil, body: nil, query: nil)

              187

    65.

                def handle_response(response)
          
      78. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    78. 
            
              178
            

            

                  case response.code
          
      79. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    79. 
            

            

                  when 200..299
          
      80. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    80. 
            
              135
            

            

                    parse_response_body(response)
          
      81. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    81. 
            

            

                  when 401
          
      82. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    82. 
            
              12
            

            

                    raise AuthenticationError, 'Authentication failed. Please login again.'
          
      83. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    83. 
            

            

                  when 403
          
      84. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    84. 
            
              1
            

            

                    raise ApiError, 'You do not have permission to perform this action.'
          
      85. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    85. 
            

            

                  when 404
          
      86. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    86. 
            
              8
            

            

                    raise ApiError, 'The requested resource was not found.'
          
      87. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    87. 
            

            

                  when 422
          
      88. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    88. 
            
              11
            

            

                    Rails.logger.info "DEBUG: ApiService - 422 response body: #{response.body}"
          
      89. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    89. 
            
              11
            

            

                    errors = parse_validation_errors(response)
          
      90. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    90. 
            
              11
            

            

                    Rails.logger.info "DEBUG: ApiService - parsed errors: #{errors.inspect}"
          
      91. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    91. 
            
              11
            

            

                    raise ValidationError.new('Validation failed', errors)
          
      92. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    92. 
            

            

                  when 500..599
          
      93. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    93. 
            
              9
            

            

                    raise ApiError, 'Server error. Please try again later.'
          
      94. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    94. 
            

            

                  else
          
      95. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    95. 
            
              2
            

            

                    raise ApiError, "Unexpected response: #{response.code} - #{response.message}"
          
      96. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    96. 
            

            

                  end
          
      97. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    97. 
            

            

                end
          
      98.

              1
            

            

                def parse_response_body(response)
          
      100. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    100. 
            
              146
            

            

                  return nil if response.body.blank?
          
      101. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    101. 
            

            

            
          
      102. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    102. 
            
              131
            

            

                  parsed = JSON.parse(response.body)
          
      103. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    103. 
            
              129
            

            

                  parsed.is_a?(Hash) ? parsed.deep_symbolize_keys : parsed
          
      104. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    104. 
            

            

                rescue JSON::ParserError => e
          
      105. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    105. 
            
              2
            

            

                  Rails.logger.error "Failed to parse response JSON: #{e.message}"
          
      106. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    106. 
            
              2
            

            

                  response.body
          
      107. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    107. 
            

            

                end
          
      108. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    108. 
            

            

                
          
      109. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    109. 
            
              1
            

            

                def parse_validation_errors(response)
          
      110. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    110. 
            
              11
            

            

                  body = parse_response_body(response)
          
      111. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    111. 
            
              11
            

            

                  return {} unless body.is_a?(Hash)
          
      112. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    112. 
            

            

            
          
      113. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    113. 
            

            

                  # Now that parse_response_body returns symbolized keys, we can use symbol access
          
      114. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    114. 
            
              9
            

            

                  body[:errors] || body[:error] || {}
          
      115. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    115. 
            

            

                rescue
          
      116. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    116. 
            

            

                  {}
          
      117. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    117. 
            

            

                end
          
      118. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    118. 
            

            

              end
          
      119. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    119. 
            

            

            end

    app/services/auth_service.rb

    77.55% lines covered

            class AuthService < ApiService

              class << self

                def login(email, password, company_id = nil, remember_me = false)

    4. 
            
              8
            

            

                  Rails.logger.info "DEBUG: AuthService.login called with email=#{email}, company_id=#{company_id}"
          
      5. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    5. 
            
              8
            

            

                  response = post('/auth/login', body: {
          
      6. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    6. 
            

            

                    grant_type: 'password',
          
      7. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    7. 
            

            

                    email: email,
          
      8. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    8. 
            

            

                    password: password,
          
      9.

            class InvoiceService < ApiService
          
      2. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    2. 
            
              1
            

            

              class << self
          
      3. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    3. 
            
              1
            

            

                def all(token:, filters: {})
          
      4. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    4. 
            
              9
            

            

                  response = get('/invoices', token: token, params: filters)
          
      5. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    5. 
            
              9
            

            

                  Rails.logger.info "DEBUG: InvoiceService.all - Raw API response: #{response.inspect}"
          
      6. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    6. 
            

            

                  
          
      7. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    7. 
            

            

                  # Transform JSON API format to expected format
          
      8. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    8. 
            
              9
            

            

                  if response[:data] && response[:data].is_a?(Array)
          
      9. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    9. 
            
              7
            

            

                    invoices = response[:data].map do |invoice_data|
          
      10. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    10. 
            
              14
            

            

                      attributes = invoice_data[:attributes] || {}
          
      11. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    11. 
            

            

                      {
          
      12. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    12. 
            
              14
            

            

                        id: invoice_data[:id],
          
      13. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    13. 
            

            

                        invoice_number: attributes[:invoice_number],
          
      14. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    14. 
            

            

                        proforma_number: attributes[:proforma_number],
          
      15. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    15. 
            

            

                        document_type: attributes[:document_type],
          
      16. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    16. 
            

            

                        invoice_type: attributes[:document_type], # alias for compatibility
          
      17. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    17. 
            

            

                        status: attributes[:status],
          
      18. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    18. 
            

            

                        date: attributes[:issue_date],
          
      19. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    19. 
            

            

                        issue_date: attributes[:issue_date], # alias for compatibility  
          
      20. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    20. 
            

            

                        due_date: attributes[:due_date],
          
      21. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    21. 
            

            

                        seller_party_id: attributes[:seller_party_id],
          
      22. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    22. 
            

            

                        buyer_party_id: attributes[:buyer_party_id],
          
      23. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    23. 
            

            

                        total_invoice: attributes[:total_invoice],
          
      24. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    24. 
            

            

                        total: attributes[:total_invoice]&.to_f, # Field used by views for display
          
      25. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    25. 
            

            

                        subtotal: attributes[:total_gross_amount_before_taxes]&.to_f, # Subtotal calculation
          
      26. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    26. 
            

            

                        total_tax: attributes[:total_tax_outputs]&.to_f, # Tax amount
          
      27. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    27. 
            

            

                        currency_code: attributes[:currency_code],
          
      28. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    28. 
            

            

                        language_code: attributes[:language_code],
          
      29. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    29. 
            

            

                        notes: attributes[:notes],
          
      30. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    30. 
            

            

                        internal_notes: attributes[:internal_notes],
          
      31. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    31. 
            

            

                        is_frozen: attributes[:is_frozen],
          
      32. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    32. 
            

            

                        frozen_at: attributes[:frozen_at],
          
      33. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    33. 
            

            

                        display_number: attributes[:display_number],
          
      34. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    34. 
            

            

                        is_proforma: attributes[:is_proforma],
          
      35. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    35. 
            

            

                        created_at: attributes[:created_at],
          
      36. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    36. 
            

            

                        updated_at: attributes[:updated_at],
          
      37. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    37. 
            

            

                        can_be_modified: attributes[:can_be_modified],
          
      38. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    38. 
            

            

                        can_be_converted: attributes[:can_be_converted],
          
      39. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    39. 
            

            

                        # Additional fields from API that might be used by views
          
      40. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    40. 
            

            

                        total_gross_amount: attributes[:total_gross_amount],
          
      41. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    41. 
            

            

                        total_gross_amount_before_taxes: attributes[:total_gross_amount_before_taxes],
          
      42. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    42. 
            

            

                        total_tax_outputs: attributes[:total_tax_outputs],
          
      43. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    43. 
            

            

                        total_tax_withheld: attributes[:total_tax_withheld],
          
      44. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    44. 
            

            

                        total_outstanding_amount: attributes[:total_outstanding_amount],
          
      45. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    45. 
            

            

                        exchange_rate: attributes[:exchange_rate],
          
      46. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    46. 
            

            

                        # Additional fields that might be missing
          
      47. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    47. 
            

            

                        payment_terms: attributes[:payment_terms],
          
      48. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    48. 
            

            

                        payment_method: attributes[:payment_method],
          
      49. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    49. 
            

            

                        # Company name from API response 
          
      50. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    50. 
            

            

                        company_name: attributes[:buyer_name]
          
      51. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    51. 
            

            

                      }
          
      52. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    52. 
            

            

                    end
          
      53. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    53. 
            

            

                    
          
      54. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    54. 
            

            

                    result = {
          
      55. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    55. 
            
              7
            

            

                      invoices: invoices,
          
      56. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    56. 
            

            

                      meta: response[:meta] || {},
          
      57. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    57. 
            
              7
            

            

                      total: response[:meta] ? response[:meta][:total] : invoices.length
          
      58. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    58. 
            

            

                    }
          
      59. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    59. 
            
              7
            

            

                    Rails.logger.info "DEBUG: InvoiceService.all - Transformed response: #{result.inspect}"
          
      60. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    60. 
            
              7
            

            

                    result
          
      61. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    61. 
            

            

                  else
          
      62. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    62. 
            
              2
            

            

                    Rails.logger.info "DEBUG: InvoiceService.all - No data field or not an array, returning raw response"
          
      63. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    63. 
            
              2
            

            

                    response
          
      64. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    64. 
            

            

                  end
          
      65. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    65. 
            

            

                end
          
      66. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    66. 
            

            

                
          
      67. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    67. 
            
              1
            

            

                def find(id, token:)
          
      68. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    68. 
            
              3
            

            

                  response = get("/invoices/#{id}", token: token)
          
      69. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    69. 
            
              3
            

            

                  Rails.logger.info "DEBUG: InvoiceService.find - Raw API response: #{response.inspect}"
          
      70. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    70. 
            

            

                  
          
      71. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    71. 
            

            

                  # Transform JSON API format to expected format
          
      72. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    72. 
            
              3
            

            

                  if response[:data]
          
      73. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    73. 
            
              2
            

            

                    attributes = response[:data][:attributes] || {}
          
      74. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    74. 
            

            

                    transformed = {
          
      75. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    75. 
            
              2
            

            

                      id: response[:data][:id],
          
      76. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    76. 
            

            

                      invoice_number: attributes[:invoice_number],
          
      77. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    77. 
            

            

                      proforma_number: attributes[:proforma_number],
          
      78. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    78. 
            

            

                      document_type: attributes[:document_type],
          
      79. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    79. 
            

            

                      invoice_type: attributes[:document_type], # alias for compatibility
          
      80. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    80. 
            

            

                      status: attributes[:status],
          
      81. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    81. 
            

            

                      date: attributes[:issue_date],
          
      82. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    82. 
            

            

                      issue_date: attributes[:issue_date], # alias for compatibility  
          
      83. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    83. 
            

            

                      due_date: attributes[:due_date],
          
      84. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    84. 
            

            

                      seller_party_id: attributes[:seller_party_id],
          
      85. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    85. 
            

            

                      buyer_party_id: attributes[:buyer_party_id],
          
      86. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    86. 
            

            

                      total_invoice: attributes[:total_invoice],
          
      87. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    87. 
            

            

                      total: attributes[:total_invoice]&.to_f, # Field used by views for display
          
      88. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    88. 
            

            

                      subtotal: attributes[:total_gross_amount_before_taxes]&.to_f, # Subtotal calculation
          
      89. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    89. 
            

            

                      total_tax: attributes[:total_tax_outputs]&.to_f, # Tax amount
          
      90. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    90. 
            

            

                      currency_code: attributes[:currency_code],
          
      91. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    91. 
            

            

                      language_code: attributes[:language_code],
          
      92. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    92. 
            

            

                      notes: attributes[:notes],
          
      93. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    93. 
            

            

                      internal_notes: attributes[:internal_notes],
          
      94. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    94. 
            

            

                      is_frozen: attributes[:is_frozen],
          
      95. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    95. 
            

            

                      frozen_at: attributes[:frozen_at],
          
      96. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    96. 
            

            

                      display_number: attributes[:display_number],
          
      97. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    97. 
            

            

                      is_proforma: attributes[:is_proforma],
          
      98. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    98. 
            

            

                      created_at: attributes[:created_at],
          
      99. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    99. 
            

            

                      updated_at: attributes[:updated_at],
          
      100. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    100. 
            

            

                      can_be_modified: attributes[:can_be_modified],
          
      101. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    101. 
            

            

                      can_be_converted: attributes[:can_be_converted],
          
      102. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    102. 
            

            

                      # Additional fields from API that might be used by views
          
      103. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    103. 
            

            

                      total_gross_amount: attributes[:total_gross_amount],
          
      104. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    104. 
            

            

                      total_gross_amount_before_taxes: attributes[:total_gross_amount_before_taxes],
          
      105. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    105. 
            

            

                      total_tax_outputs: attributes[:total_tax_outputs],
          
      106. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    106. 
            

            

                      total_tax_withheld: attributes[:total_tax_withheld],
          
      107. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    107. 
            

            

                      total_outstanding_amount: attributes[:total_outstanding_amount],
          
      108. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    108. 
            

            

                      exchange_rate: attributes[:exchange_rate],
          
      109. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    109. 
            

            

                      # Additional fields that might be missing
          
      110. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    110. 
            

            

                      payment_terms: attributes[:payment_terms],
          
      111. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    111. 
            

            

                      payment_method: attributes[:payment_method],
          
      112. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    112. 
            
              1
            

            

                      invoice_lines: response[:included]&.select { |item| item[:type] == 'invoice_lines' }&.map do |line|
          
      113. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    113. 
            
              1
            

            

                        line_attrs = line[:attributes] || {}
          
      114. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    114. 
            

            

                        {
          
      115. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    115. 
            
              1
            

            

                          id: line[:id],
          
      116. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    116. 
            

            

                          description: line_attrs[:description],
          
      117. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    117. 
            

            

                          quantity: line_attrs[:quantity],
          
      118. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    118. 
            

            

                          unit_price: line_attrs[:unit_price],
          
      119. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    119. 
            

            

                          tax_rate: line_attrs[:tax_rate],
          
      120. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    120. 
            

            

                          discount_percentage: line_attrs[:discount_percentage],
          
      121. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    121. 
            

            

                          total: line_attrs[:total] || (line_attrs[:quantity].to_f * line_attrs[:unit_price].to_f)
          
      122. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    122. 
            

            

                        }
          
      123. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    123. 
            

            

                      end || []
          
      124. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    124. 
            

            

                    }
          
      125. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    125. 
            
              2
            

            

                    Rails.logger.info "DEBUG: InvoiceService.find - Transformed invoice: #{transformed.inspect}"
          
      126. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    126. 
            
              2
            

            

                    Rails.logger.info "DEBUG: InvoiceService.find - Transformed invoice[:id]: #{transformed[:id].inspect} (#{transformed[:id].class})"
          
      127. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    127. 
            
              2
            

            

                    transformed
          
      128. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    128. 
            

            

                  else
          
      129. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    129. 
            
              1
            

            

                    Rails.logger.info "DEBUG: InvoiceService.find - No data field in response, returning raw response"
          
      130. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    130. 
            
              1
            

            

                    response
          
      131. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    131. 
            

            

                  end
          
      132. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    132. 
            

            

                end
          
      133. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    133. 
            

            

                
          
      134. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    134. 
            
              1
            

            

                def create(params, token:)
          
      135. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    135. 
            

            

                  # Extract line items before creating invoice
          
      136. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    136. 
            
              6
            

            

                  line_items = params.delete(:invoice_lines_attributes) || []
          
      137. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    137. 
            

            

                  
          
      138. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    138. 
            

            

                  # Convert to JSON API format
          
      139. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    139. 
            
              6
            

            

                  json_api_params = format_for_api(params)
          
      140. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    140. 
            
              6
            

            

                  response = post('/invoices', token: token, body: json_api_params)
          
      141. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    141. 
            

            

                  
          
      142. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    142. 
            

            

                  # Add line items to the created invoice if any exist
          
      143. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    143. 
            
              6
            

            

                  if response[:data] && response[:data][:id] && line_items.any?
          
      144. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    144. 
            
              5
            

            

                    invoice_id = response[:data][:id]
          
      145. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    145. 
            
              5
            

            

                    line_items.each do |line_item|
          
      146. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    146. 
            

            

                      begin
          
      147. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    147. 
            

            

                        # Remove nil values and ensure proper format
          
      148. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    148. 
            
              5
            

            

                        clean_line_item = line_item.compact
          
      149. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    149. 
            

            

                        
          
      150. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    150. 
            

            

                        # Map client field names to API field names
          
      151. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    151. 
            

            

                        api_line_item = {
          
      152. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    152. 
            
              5
            

            

                          item_description: clean_line_item[:description] || clean_line_item['description'],
          
      153. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    153. 
            

            

                          unit_price_without_tax: clean_line_item[:unit_price] || clean_line_item['unit_price'],
          
      154. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    154. 
            

            

                          quantity: clean_line_item[:quantity] || clean_line_item['quantity'],
          
      155. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    155. 
            

            

                          tax_rate: clean_line_item[:tax_rate] || clean_line_item['tax_rate'],
          
      156. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    156. 
            

            

                          discount_percentage: clean_line_item[:discount_percentage] || clean_line_item['discount_percentage']
          
      157. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    157. 
            

            

                        }
          
      158. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    158. 
            

            

                        
          
      159. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    159. 
            

            

                        # Calculate gross_amount (unit_price * quantity)
          
      160. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    160. 
            
              5
            

            

                        unit_price = api_line_item[:unit_price_without_tax].to_f
          
      161. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    161. 
            
              5
            

            

                        quantity = api_line_item[:quantity].to_f
          
      162. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    162. 
            
              5
            

            

                        api_line_item[:gross_amount] = (unit_price * quantity).round(2)
          
      163. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    163. 
            

            

                        
          
      164. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    164. 
            
              5
            

            

                        Rails.logger.info "DEBUG: Adding line item to invoice #{invoice_id}: #{api_line_item.inspect}"
          
      165. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    165. 
            
              5
            

            

                        add_line_item(invoice_id, api_line_item, token: token)
          
      166. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    166. 
            
              5
            

            

                        Rails.logger.info "DEBUG: Line item added successfully"
          
      167. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    167. 
            

            

                      rescue => e
          
      168. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    168. 
            

            

                        Rails.logger.error "DEBUG: Error adding line item: #{e.class} - #{e.message}"
          
      169. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    169. 
            

            

                        # Continue with other line items, don't fail the entire invoice creation
          
      170. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    170. 
            

            

                      end
          
      171. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    171. 
            

            

                    end
          
      172. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    172. 
            

            

                    
          
      173. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    173. 
            

            

                    # Recalculate taxes after all line items have been added
          
      174. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    174. 
            
              5
            

            

                    Rails.logger.info "DEBUG: Recalculating taxes for invoice #{invoice_id}"
          
      175. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    175. 
            
              5
            

            

                    recalculate_taxes(invoice_id, token: token)
          
      176. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    176. 
            
              5
            

            

                    Rails.logger.info "DEBUG: Tax recalculation completed"
          
      177. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    177. 
            

            

                  end
          
      178. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    178. 
            

            

                  
          
      179. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    179. 
            
              6
            

            

                  response
          
      180. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    180. 
            

            

                end
          
      181. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    181. 
            

            

                
          
      182. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    182. 
            
              1
            

            

                def update(id, params, token:)
          
      183. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    183. 
            

            

                  # Convert to JSON API format
          
      184. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    184. 
            
              1
            

            

                  json_api_params = format_for_api(params)
          
      185. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    185. 
            
              1
            

            

                  put("/invoices/#{id}", token: token, body: json_api_params)
          
      186. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    186. 
            

            

                end
          
      187. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    187. 
            

            

                
          
      188. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    188. 
            
              1
            

            

                def delete(id, token:)
          
      189. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    189. 
            
              1
            

            

                  super("/invoices/#{id}", token: token)
          
      190. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    190. 
            

            

                end
          
      191. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    191. 
            

            

                
          
      192. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    192. 
            

            

                # Invoice actions
          
      193. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    193. 
            
              1
            

            

                def freeze(id, token:)
          
      194. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    194. 
            
              1
            

            

                  post("/invoices/#{id}/freeze", token: token)
          
      195. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    195. 
            

            

                end
          
      196. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    196. 
            

            

                
          
      197. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    197. 
            

            

                # Note: unfreeze and send_email methods removed - not supported by API
          
      198. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    198. 
            

            

                
          
      199. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    199. 
            

            

                # Status transitions
          
      200. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    200. 
            
              1
            

            

                def update_status(id, status, comment: nil, token:)
          
      201. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    201. 
            

            

                  body = {
          
      202. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    202. 
            
              1
            

            

                    data: {
          
      203. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    203. 
            

            

                      type: 'invoices',
          
      204. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    204. 
            

            

                      attributes: {
          
      205. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    205. 
            

            

                        status: status
          
      206. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    206. 
            

            

                      }
          
      207. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    207. 
            

            

                    }
          
      208. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    208. 
            

            

                  }
          
      209. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    209. 
            

            

                  
          
      210. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    210. 
            
              1
            

            

                  body[:data][:attributes][:comment] = comment if comment.present?

                def download_file(endpoint, token:)
          
      264. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    264. 
            

            

                  options = {
          
      265. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    265. 
            
              1
            

            

                    headers: {
          
      266. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    266. 
            

            

                      'Authorization' => "Bearer #{token}",
          
      267. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    267. 
            

            

                      'Accept' => '*/*'
          
      268. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    268. 
            

            

                    }
          
      269. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    269. 
            

            

                  }
          
      270. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    270. 
            

            

                  
          
      271. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    271. 
            
              1
            

            

                  url = "#{ApiService::BASE_URL}#{endpoint}"
          
      272. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    272. 
            
              1
            

            

                  response = HTTParty.get(url, options)
          
      273. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    273. 
            

            

                  
          
      274. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    274. 
            
              1
            

            

                  case response.code
          
      275. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    275. 
            

            

                  when 200
          
      276. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    276. 
            
              1
            

            

                    response.body
          
      277. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    277. 
            

            

                  when 401
          
      278. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    278. 
            

            

                    raise ApiService::AuthenticationError, 'Authentication failed'
          
      279. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    279. 
            

            

                  when 404
          
      280. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    280. 
            

            

                    raise ApiService::ApiError, 'Resource not found'
          
      281. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    281. 
            

            

                  else
          
      282. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    282. 
            

            

                    raise ApiService::ApiError, "Request failed with status: #{response.code}"
          
      283. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    283. 
            

            

                  end
          
      284. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    284. 
            

            

                rescue HTTParty::Error => e
          
      285. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    285. 
            

            

                  raise ApiService::ApiError, "Network error: #{e.message}"
          
      286. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    286. 
            

            

                end
          
      287. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    287. 
            

            

                
          
      288. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    288. 
            

            

                # Convert flat hash to JSON API format
          
      289.

                def format_for_api(params)
          
      290. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    290. 
            

            

                  # Don't modify original params, work with a copy
          
      291. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    291. 
            
              7
            

            

                  params_copy = params.dup
          
      292. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    292. 
            

            

                  
          
      293. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    293. 
            

            

                  # Extract relationships
          
      294. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    294. 
            
              7
            

            

                  seller_party_id = params_copy.delete(:seller_party_id)
          
      295. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    295. 
            
              7
            

            

                  buyer_party_id = params_copy.delete(:buyer_party_id)
          
      296. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    296. 
            

            

                  
          
      297. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    297. 
            

            

                  # Build JSON API structure
          
      298. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    298. 
            

            

                  json_api_params = {
          
      299. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    299. 
            
              7
            

            

                    data: {
          
      300. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    300. 
            

            

                      type: 'invoices',
          
      301. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    301. 
            

            

                      attributes: params_copy
          
      302. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    302. 
            

            

                    }
          
      303. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    303. 
            

            

                  }
          
      304. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    304. 
            

            

                  
          
      305. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    305. 
            

            

                  # Add relationships if present
          
      306. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    306. 
            
              7
            

            

                  if seller_party_id || buyer_party_id
          
      307. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    307. 
            
              6
            

            

                    json_api_params[:data][:relationships] = {}
          
      308. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    308. 
            

            

                    
          
      309. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    309. 
            
              6
            

            

                    if seller_party_id
          
      310. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    310. 
            
              6
            

            

                      json_api_params[:data][:relationships][:seller_party] = {
          
      311. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    311. 
            

            

                        data: { type: 'companies', id: seller_party_id.to_s }
          
      312. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    312. 
            

            

                      }
          
      313. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    313. 
            

            

                    end
          
      314. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    314. 
            

            

                    
          
      315. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    315. 
            
              6
            

            

                    if buyer_party_id
          
      316. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    316. 
            
              6
            

            

                      json_api_params[:data][:relationships][:buyer_party] = {
          
      317. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    317. 
            

            

                        data: { type: 'companies', id: buyer_party_id.to_s }
          
      318. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    318.

      319. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    319.

      320. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    320. 
            

            

                  end
          
      321. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    321. 
            

            

                  
          
      322. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    322. 
            
              7

      323. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    323.

      324.

              def self.history(token:, params: {})

                get('/workflow_history', token: token, params: params)
          
      6. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    6. 
            

            

              end
          
      7. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    7.

    8.

              def self.transition(invoice_id, status:, comment: nil, token:)
          
      13.

                body = {
          
      14.

              def self.create_definition(params, token:)
          
      34. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    34. 
            

            

                body = {
          
      35. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    35. 
            
              3
            

            

                  data: {
          
      36.

    38. 
            

            

                }
          
      39. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    39. 
            
              3
            

            

                result = post('/workflow_definitions', body: body, token: token)
          
      40. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    40. 
            
              3
            

            

                Rails.logger.info "DEBUG: WorkflowService.create_definition returned: #{result.inspect}"
          
      41. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    41. 
            
              3
            

            

                result
          
      42. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    42.

              # Note: The following methods were removed as they don't exist in the API:
          
      114.

              # - rules, create_rule, update_rule, delete_rule (workflow rules CRUD)

              #
          
      117. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    117. 
            

            

              # The API uses workflow_definitions instead of rules/templates.
          
      118. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    118. 
            

            

            end
          
      119.
